translation.en: [advocate] This is one of the most screwed-up parts of the United States system, period.
translation.zh:
‎这是美国体系中最糟糕的一部分
‎毫无疑问

translation.en: It's unethical, and it's immoral.
translation.zh: ‎这是不道德的 是邪恶的

translation.en: Parents have no rights. Parents have no rights.
translation.zh: ‎父母没有权利

translation.en: I know it would've been kinder for them to shoot you
translation.zh:
‎我知道如果他们开抢打死你
‎那样还更友好

translation.en: than to take your child away.
translation.zh: ‎而不是带走你的孩子

translation.en: [mother] Why, for so many years, no one has changed this?
translation.zh:
‎为什么这么多年来
‎没有人改变这件事？

translation.en: This is screwed up.
translation.zh: ‎这太糟糕了

translation.en: [advocate] That is why I'm telling you, when you get your child back,
translation.zh: ‎所以我才告诉你 ‎当你把孩子弄回来的时候

translation.en: you leave that hospital, and you never ever go back.
translation.zh:
‎你离开了那个医院
‎永远都不要再回去

translation.en: [woman] I'm gonna be frank. I'm appalled at what this child has had to go through.
translation.zh:
‎老实说
‎我为这个孩子经历的事感到震惊

translation.en: -[child] Monster! -[mother] No monsters. Mommy's here.
translation.zh:
‎-怪物！
‎-没有怪物 妈妈在这里

translation.en: [woman] I feel like you had your head in the sand. [man] I trusted the doctors.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得你当时有些逃避
‎-我当时相信医生

translation.en: [bailiff] Do you solemnly swear the testimony you give is the truth,
translation.zh:
‎你是否严肃地发誓或者确认
‎即将给出的证词

translation.en: the whole truth, and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh: ‎完全是真实的 没有半点虚假？

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: ‎我发誓

translation.en: [mother] I can't help it. I'm fighting for my child.
translation.zh: ‎我没办法 我在为我的孩子而战

translation.en: How should I feel?
translation.zh: ‎我应该有什么感觉？

translation.en: [man, crying] Oh my God.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: [911 dispatch] Tell me exactly what happened.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我具体发生了什么事

translation.en: [young woman] You have the audacity to ask me why I'm afraid of hospitals?
translation.zh: ‎你居然有胆量问我为什么害怕医院？

translation.en: You traumatized me!
translation.zh: ‎你们对我造成了心理伤害！

translation.en: [bailiff] All rise. This 12th Judicial Circuit Court is now in session.
translation.zh:
‎全体起立
‎第12司法巡回法院现在开庭

translation.en: [child] I miss you, and I hope I get to see you soon.
translation.zh: ‎我很想你 我希望能很快见到你

translation.en: [mother] I'm sure you will see me pretty soon.
translation.zh: ‎我相信你很快就会见到我

translation.en: We just have to be patient, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们只需要耐心点 好吗？

translation.en: [man] We build a family with love.
translation.zh: ‎我们用爱建立一个家庭

translation.en: -Honesty. -[children shouting excitedly]
translation.zh: ‎用诚实

translation.en: Trust.
translation.zh: ‎用信任

translation.en: We, as parents, try to do the best we can for our children.
translation.zh:
‎我们作为父母
‎尽量为我们的孩子做到最好

translation.en: You do everything for them.
translation.zh: ‎你什么都愿意为他们做

translation.en: That's what Beata and I did.
translation.zh: ‎这正是我和贝亚特所做的

translation.en: But there's nothing that could prepare me
translation.zh: ‎但没有什么能让我和家人

translation.en: for what I went through with my family.
translation.zh: ‎准备好我们所经历的事情

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: ‎没有

translation.en: [court clerk] This marks the beginning of the deposition of Jack Kowalski.
translation.zh: ‎这标志着杰克·考尔斯基的证词开始

translation.en: We are on the record. October 25th, 2021, at 9:02 a.m.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在录制
‎2021年10月25日上午9:02

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Mr. Kowalski, I'd like to ask a little bit about your wife.
translation.zh:
‎考尔斯基先生
‎我想问一些你妻子的事情

translation.en: [Jack] I started falling in love with Beata right away.
translation.zh: ‎我立刻就爱上了贝亚特

translation.en: She had something special about her.
translation.zh: ‎她有她的独特之处

translation.en: It was in her eyes.
translation.zh: ‎就在她眼里

translation.en: She was genuine.
translation.zh: ‎她很真诚

translation.en: She was magic, you know?
translation.zh: ‎她很神奇 你知道吗？

translation.en: Beata came here from communist Poland
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特16岁的时候

translation.en: when she was 16 years old.
translation.zh: ‎从共产主义波兰来到这里

translation.en: She went to high school in Chicago,
translation.zh: ‎她在芝加哥上高中

translation.en: and I remember her telling me
translation.zh: ‎我记得她告诉我

translation.en: that one of her teachers said she was never gonna make it
translation.zh: ‎她的一个老师说 她永远都不会成功

translation.en: because she don't know how to speak English too well.
translation.zh: ‎因为她不知道如何讲好英语

translation.en: And that's not the thing to tell Beata, because she didn't take no for an answer.
translation.zh:
‎这种话可不能对贝亚特讲
‎因为她绝不接受否定

translation.en: And yes, I did hear "no" a lot of times where I was wrong.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我很多次听到了否定
‎全都是我错了

translation.en: She put herself through college,
translation.zh: ‎她读完了大学

translation.en: and she became a nurse in the cardiac cath lab
translation.zh: ‎她在洛约拉大学医学中心

translation.en: at Loyola University Medical Center.
translation.zh: ‎成为了一个心脏科护士

translation.en: She proved them wrong.
translation.zh: ‎她证明了他们是错的

translation.en: Beata wanted nothing more than to have her own child.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特最想要的就是自己的孩子

translation.en: Right away, she planned how the room was gonna be,
translation.zh:
‎她立刻就计划好
‎这个房间应该弄成什么样

translation.en: and she would go out and buy clothes and decorate.
translation.zh: ‎她会出去买布装饰

translation.en: From the very beginning, I knew she was gonna be a great mother.
translation.zh:
‎从一开始
‎我就知道她会是一个很好的妈妈

translation.en: Unfortunately, we had some difficulty having a child.
translation.zh: ‎不幸的是 我们生孩子有点困难

translation.en: But no matter how stressful it was, Beata wasn't gonna give up.
translation.zh: ‎但无论有多大压力 ‎贝亚特不会放弃

translation.en: -[heartbeat] -She would not give up.
translation.zh: ‎她不会放弃

translation.en: And that's when Maya was born.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅就是在那时出生的

translation.en: Beata always made sure that Maya had the best of the best.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特总是确保玛雅拥有最好的一切

translation.en: Piano lessons. Polish school.
translation.zh: ‎钢琴课 波兰学校

translation.en: She wrote little notes about everywhere Maya went.
translation.zh:
‎她在笔记上记录了
‎玛雅去过的每个地方

translation.en: It was just the warm feeling of having more to share in our lives.
translation.zh:
‎在我们的生命中
‎有更多可以分享的 那种感觉很温暖

translation.en: And then, two years later, Kyle was born.
translation.zh: ‎然后 两年之后 凯尔出生了

translation.en: Stroke of luck.
translation.zh: ‎单纯运气好

translation.en: No… No trying! [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎没有努力尝试

translation.en: -[guitar playing] -♪ I found myself dreamin' ♪
translation.zh: ‎我发现自己在做梦

translation.en: ♪ In silver and gold ♪
translation.zh: ‎银和金

translation.en: ♪ Like a scene from the movies ♪
translation.zh: ‎就像电影里的一幕

translation.en: ♪ That every broken heart knows ♪
translation.zh: ‎每个伤心的人都知道

translation.en: [Jack] In early spring of 2015,
life was good.
translation.zh: ‎生活很美满

translation.en: Beata was working as an infusion nurse,
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特从事输液护士的工作

translation.en: helping people with their treatments at home.
translation.zh: ‎帮助人们在家完成治疗

translation.en: I was a firefighter,
translation.zh: ‎我当时是一名消防员

translation.en: and then eventually retired,
translation.zh: ‎最后退休了

translation.en: and I was able to spend more time with the kids.
translation.zh: ‎我能够花更多的时间和孩子们在一起

translation.en: We had a beautiful house, beautiful neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎我们有漂亮的房子 漂亮的邻里街区

translation.en: Dream come true. Paradise.
translation.zh: ‎梦想实现了 天堂

translation.en: But then Maya started to get sick.
translation.zh: ‎但后来玛雅开始生病了

translation.en: [court clerk] This marks the beginning of the deposition of Maya Kowalski.
translation.zh: ‎这标志着玛雅·考尔斯基的证词开始

translation.en: We are on the record. Friday, October 15, 2021.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在录制
‎2021年10月15日 星期五

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Hi, Maya. Um…
translation.zh: ‎嗨 玛雅

translation.en: Now, back during the period of time, you know, 2015 to 2017,
translation.zh:
‎在过去的那段时期里
‎你知道 2015年到2017年

translation.en: I'd like to get an idea of what type of symptoms you had back then.
translation.zh: ‎我想要了解你当时患病的病症类型

translation.en: Do you recall?
translation.zh: ‎你记得吗？

translation.en: I remember I was in a great deal of pain.
translation.zh: ‎我记得我当时很痛苦

translation.en: My arms, my legs, my feet.
translation.zh: ‎我的胳膊、我的腿、我的脚

translation.en: I would always feel very lethargic,
translation.zh: ‎我总是感觉昏昏欲睡

translation.en: and I wasn't able to move as efficiently anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我的动作不再能利索了

translation.en: We didn't know the exact cause, and it got progressively worse.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道具体病因
‎但情况越来越严重

translation.en: -[man] When did she start having problems? -[Beata] So…
translation.zh: ‎她什么时候开始有问题的？

translation.en: At first, I didn't think much of it.
translation.zh: ‎一开始我没有想那么多

translation.en: I just thought it was her asthma.
translation.zh: ‎我以为只是因为她的气喘

translation.en: -But then she had chest congestion. -[doctor] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-但后来她出现了胸闷
‎-好

translation.en: -Okay. -[Beata] Coughing up yellow-green sputum.
translation.zh: ‎咳出黄绿色的痰

translation.en: -[doctor] Okay. -[Beata] Sinus infection. And she couldn't go outside.
translation.zh: ‎鼻窦感染 她没办法去外面

translation.en: Every time she went outside, she started to cough.
translation.zh: ‎每次她去外面 就开始咳嗽

translation.en: [Jack] It all started with some breathing problems.
translation.zh: ‎一切都开始于一些呼吸问题

translation.en: Uh, she had a respiratory infection.
translation.zh: ‎她呼吸道感染了

translation.en: [Jack] She was experiencing headaches, blurred vision.
translation.zh: ‎她头疼 视力模糊

translation.en: -Her skin felt like it was on fire. -[Maya wheezing]
translation.zh: ‎她的皮肤感觉像在灼烧

translation.en: [Beata] That doesn't feel good when I touch your legs, right?
translation.zh:
‎当我触摸你的腿时
‎感觉不太好 对吧？

translation.en: [Jack] Her legs were turning in.
translation.zh: ‎她的腿都向内弯转了

translation.en: -[woman] You can do it. You can do it! -[Beata] You're almost by Mommy.
translation.zh:
‎-你可以的
‎-你马上就到妈妈身边了

translation.en: -[Jack] She couldn't walk. -[Beata] Almost there.
translation.zh: ‎她无法走路 ‎马上到了

translation.en: -[Beata] I know. -[Maya] I can't take it!
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-我不行了！

translation.en: I can't take it! [crying]
translation.zh: ‎我不行了！

translation.en: [Jack] I remember hearing her crying throughout the night in extreme pain.
translation.zh: ‎我记得听到她在彻夜的剧痛中哭泣

translation.en: [Beata, faintly] I know.
translation.zh: ‎我知道

translation.en: But we had no answers.
translation.zh: ‎但我们给不出答案

translation.en: That was not acceptable for us.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们无法接受的

translation.en: -[coughing continues] -[Beata] Maya.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅

translation.en: -[Maya whimpering] -[Beata] Be strong.
translation.zh: ‎坚强一点

translation.en: [Maya] I'm trying to be strong.
translation.zh: ‎我在努力坚强

translation.en: [Jack] We went to doctor after doctor,
translation.zh: ‎我们去了一家又一家医院

translation.en: one hospital to another,
translation.zh: ‎拜访了一个又一个医生…

translation.en: trying to get an answer.
translation.zh: ‎试图得到一个答案

translation.en: And as a nurse, Beata was very thorough,
translation.zh: ‎作为一个护士 贝亚特非常仔细

translation.en: so she documented every doctor visit
translation.zh: ‎所以她从一开始

translation.en: from the very beginning,
translation.zh: ‎就记录了每个医生的访问

translation.en: but they just put their arms up in the air and said, "There's nothing we can do."
translation.zh:
‎但他们只是举起手
‎很无奈地说“我们什么也做不了”

translation.en: "We don't know what it is."
translation.zh: ‎“我们不知道那是什么”

translation.en: [doctor] I hear your story.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我听说了你的故事

translation.en: I understand she's been going through a heck of a lot of stuff,
translation.zh: ‎我知道她经历了很多痛苦

translation.en: but I'm still not certain of what we're dealing with,
translation.zh: ‎但我跟你说实话

translation.en: to be honest with you.
translation.zh: ‎我仍然不确定这是什么病

translation.en: -A kid can tell you, "I can't breathe…" -[Beata] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎孩子能告诉你
‎“我无法呼吸 我无法呼吸”

translation.en: [doctor] How do I know she's not having an anxiety attack?
translation.zh: ‎我不知道她是否是焦虑症发作

translation.en: -[Beata] Well-- -[doctor] There's a lot of question marks.
translation.zh: ‎这… ‎所以有很多事情是不确定的

translation.en: [doctor] Just give me one second.
translation.zh: ‎给我一点时间

translation.en: -[Beata sighs] -[Maya] Mom, it's not anxiety.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 这不是焦虑

translation.en: -[Beata] I know, baby. I know. -[Maya whimpers]
translation.zh: ‎我知道 宝贝 我知道

translation.en: [Beata] He's just trying to figure it out. You just stay as calm as you can.
translation.zh:
‎他只是试图搞清楚
‎你尽量保持冷静

translation.en: [Jack] We knew, as parents, something was wrong, and they are not doing enough.
translation.zh:
‎作为父母 我们知道有些不对
‎知道他们做得不够

translation.en: So when Beata got home, she didn't go to bed.
translation.zh:
‎所以当贝亚特到家的时候
‎她没有去睡觉

translation.en: She researched.
translation.zh: ‎她进行了研究

translation.en: And that's when she ended up finding Dr. Kirkpatrick.
translation.zh:
‎就是这时候
‎她最终找到了柯帕里克医生

translation.en: [man] Maya, is it okay if we can use this video to educate other children?
translation.zh:
‎玛雅 我们可以用这段视频
‎教育其他孩子吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[man] Okay, good.
translation.zh:
‎-可以
‎-好 很好

translation.en: Let's go over your history a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎我们来温习一下你的历史

translation.en: Approximately three months ago,
translation.zh: ‎大约三个月前

translation.en: you started having some pain down in your feet here, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你的脚这里开始痛了 是吗？

translation.en: You see how her legs are turning in?
translation.zh: ‎你看到她的腿向内弯折了吗？

translation.en: We call that dystonia, okay? Dystonia.
translation.zh:
‎我们称之为肌张力障碍 好吗？
‎肌张力障碍

translation.en: In fact, it's so bad right now she can't even bear weight safely, okay?
translation.zh:
‎事实上 现在情况很糟
‎她甚至不能安全地承受重量 好吗？

translation.en: -Ready for testing? -[Maya] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-准备好做点检测了吗？
‎-对

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Take that right hand, as best you can,
translation.zh: ‎好 尽你所能举起右手

translation.en: and see how far you can get it before you have to stop, okay?
translation.zh:
‎在达到你的上限 必须停止之前
‎看看你能举起多高 好吗？

translation.en: Is that… That's it, right there? Very good, Maya.
translation.zh:
‎已经… 就这样 就到那儿了？
‎非常棒 玛雅

translation.en: Now we're gonna ask your mom to help you.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们要请你妈妈帮助你

translation.en: She's gonna get over here, and she's gonna hold your foot up
translation.zh: ‎她要到这里来 举起你的脚

translation.en: and try to wiggle your toes as best you can, okay?
translation.zh: ‎尽力扭动你的脚趾 尽你所能 好吗？

translation.en: Can you try that?
translation.zh: ‎你可以试试吗？

translation.en: You giving it everything you got there?
translation.zh: ‎你尽全力了吗？

translation.en: -Mom, you don't see any movement, do you? -[Beata] No.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈 你没看到任何动作 是吧？
‎-没有

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Okay, Mom. Good job.
translation.zh: ‎好的 妈妈 很好 做得好

translation.en: Maya, would you like to have a blanket…
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 你想要一个毯子…

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] When I first saw the Kowalskis in September 2015,
translation.zh: ‎我2015年9月第一次见到考尔斯基

translation.en: it was obvious what the problem was with Maya.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅是什么问题很明显

translation.en: It was clear and simple CRPS,
translation.zh: ‎非常简单清楚 区域疼痛

translation.en: complex regional pain syndrome.
translation.zh: ‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: [narrator] This videotape has been prepared
translation.zh: ‎本录像的准备

translation.en: in consultation with Dr. Anthony Kirkpatrick.
translation.zh: ‎经过咨询安东尼·柯帕里克医生

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] What is complex regional pain syndrome?
translation.zh: ‎什么是复杂性区域疼痛综合征？

translation.en: The best way to think about it is the way it evolves.
translation.zh: ‎最好的理解方式是它怎样发展

translation.en: Let's say you have an injury.
translation.zh: ‎假设你受伤了

translation.en: You know that probably in a week or two, the pain's gonna go down,
translation.zh:
‎你知道可能在一、两周后
‎疼痛就会减轻

translation.en: the swelling's gonna go down, the redness and all that's gonna go down.
translation.zh:
‎肿胀会消退
‎红肿和其他症状都会消失

translation.en: But what happens in these patients with CRPS
translation.zh:
‎但在复杂性区域疼痛综合征
‎患者身上发生的情况是

translation.en: is that it actually intensifies over that period of time.
translation.zh: ‎实际上整个期间症状会强化

translation.en: [narrator] Published case studies indicate
translation.zh: ‎公开发表的案例研究显示

translation.en: that the incident of CRPS increases dramatically
translation.zh: ‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征的发生

translation.en: between nine and 11 years old,
translation.zh: ‎在九到11岁之间急剧上升

translation.en: and it is found predominantly in young girls.
translation.zh: ‎而且主要发现于年轻女孩身上

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] The patients describe it primarily as a burning sensation.
translation.zh: ‎病患描述的主要症状是烧灼感

translation.en: That their skin becomes exquisitely sensitive to light touch.
translation.zh: ‎他们的皮肤对轻触变得非常敏感

translation.en: [woman 1] Picture a floating feather, soft to our touch.
translation.zh:
‎想象一根漂浮的羽毛
‎我们碰触感觉很轻柔

translation.en: Patients say this feels more like
translation.zh: ‎患者说这感觉更像

translation.en: a knife stabbing their body.
translation.zh: ‎一把刀刺进他们的身体

translation.en: The syndrome was first described over 100 years ago,
translation.zh:
‎这个病征第一次被描述
‎是在100多年前

translation.en: but it was only recognized in modern medicine in the 1990s.
translation.zh: ‎在1990年才被现代医学所认识到

translation.en: Still, many don't know the problem exists, and many of those suffering were told
translation.zh:
‎直到现在
‎很多人依然不知道这个问题的存在 ‎很多患者被告知
‎症状是心理想象出来的

translation.en: the problem was psychological and imagined.
translation.zh:
‎很多患者被告知
‎症状是心理想象出来的

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] After my initial evaluation for Maya,
translation.zh: ‎在我对玛雅进行初步评估之后

translation.en: it was clear to me that, because of the magnitude of her symptoms,
translation.zh:
‎我很清楚
‎因为她的症状严重

translation.en: the lesions, this burning sensation in her legs,
translation.zh: ‎皮肤损伤 腿上的灼烧感

translation.en: and the pain throughout her entire body,
translation.zh: ‎贯穿全身的疼痛

translation.en: that Maya had advanced CRPS
translation.zh: ‎玛雅患有晚期复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: that we had to right away get aggressive with and get under control.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须立即进行积极治疗
‎控制病情

translation.en: We've treated over 3,000 patients with complex regional pain syndrome.
translation.zh:
‎我们已经治疗了超过三千名
‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征病患

translation.en: And we know what the best therapy is for it.
translation.zh: ‎我们知道最佳疗法是什么

translation.en: It's called ketamine.
translation.zh: ‎叫做氯胺酮

translation.en: [woman 2] A drug typically known for its recreational use in clubs
translation.zh:
‎一种通常被人熟知
‎用在俱乐部中的药

translation.en: is now making another name for itself among pain-management specialists.
translation.zh:
‎现在在疼痛治疗专家之间
‎有另一个名声

translation.en: It's called ketamine, and medical experts are using it
translation.zh: ‎叫做氯胺酮 药物专家用它

translation.en: to treat patients suffering from chronic pain.
translation.zh: ‎治疗患有慢性疼痛的病人

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Ketamine is a safe, effective treatment
translation.zh:
‎氯胺酮对于晚期
‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: for advanced complex regional pain syndrome.
translation.zh: ‎是安全有效的疗法

translation.en: Because when the ketamine gets into your body,
translation.zh: ‎因为当氯胺酮进入你的身体

translation.en: it actually stimulates the brain and kind of resets everything.
translation.zh:
‎它其实激发了大脑
‎并且某种程度上重启了一切

translation.en: It tends to increase your blood pressure, increase your circulation,
translation.zh:
‎它通常会增加你的血压
‎增进你的血液循环

translation.en: and increase your breathing.
translation.zh: ‎增强你的呼吸

translation.en: With Maya, we first tried the outpatient procedure
translation.zh: ‎对玛雅 我们先用相对较低的剂量

translation.en: at a relatively low dose…
translation.zh: ‎尝试门诊治疗…

translation.en: -[Kirkpatrick] Any pain? -Um…
translation.zh: ‎有造成任何疼痛吗？

translation.en: …but it was not working.
translation.zh: ‎…但没有见效

translation.en: Just here…
translation.zh: ‎就在这儿…

translation.en: So I discussed with the mother and with Maya
translation.zh: ‎于是我跟妈妈和玛雅讨论了一下

translation.en: the idea of the ketamine coma procedure.
translation.zh: ‎氯胺酮昏迷治疗的想法

translation.en: [anchor] Some patients are taking control of their pain by going into a coma.
translation.zh:
‎有些病人会凭借进入昏迷状态
‎来控制疼痛

translation.en: Here, doctors use up to 50 times the typical dose
translation.zh:
‎在这里 医生通过使用
‎通常剂量的最高50倍量

translation.en: to induce a five-day coma.
translation.zh: ‎引发一次五天的昏迷

translation.en: You see enough patients, you know how they deteriorate.
translation.zh:
‎你看到足够多的病人
‎你知道他们如何恶化

translation.en: Nothing is working.
translation.zh: ‎什么都不起作用

translation.en: Surgery doesn't work, drugs don't work, nerve blocks don't work,
translation.zh:
‎手术不起作用 药物不起作用
‎神经阻滞不起作用

translation.en: and you do this one thing, and it works.
translation.zh: ‎然后你做了这一件事 它就起作用了

translation.en: [anchor] Dr. Kirkpatrick says
translation.zh: ‎柯帕里克医生说

translation.en: the experimental treatment is only available in Mexico.
translation.zh: ‎这种实验性的治疗只能在墨西哥接受

translation.en: When this was told to me, that we would have to go to Mexico,
translation.zh: ‎当他们告诉我 我们必须去墨西哥时

translation.en: I… I was in disbelief.
translation.zh: ‎我不敢相信

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] …flat on your back…
translation.zh: ‎…背朝下平躺…

translation.en: [Jack] And then he told us that there's a chance that she could potentially die.
translation.zh:
‎然后他告诉我们
‎她可能有死亡的危险

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] I have a feeling she'll do very well.
translation.zh: ‎我有感觉她会做得很好 非常好

translation.en: [Jack] It was very scary,
translation.zh: ‎非常可怕

translation.en: but there was no other options.
translation.zh: ‎但当时没有其他选择

translation.en: It was that, or see Maya deteriorate every day.
translation.zh: ‎选择治疗 不然就每天看着玛雅恶化

translation.en: So we decided to take her to Monterrey, Mexico.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们决定带她去墨西哥蒙特雷

translation.en: -[Maya, crying] I will wake up? -[Beata] Yes, you will.
translation.zh: ‎我会醒来吗？ ‎是的 你会从昏迷中醒来的

translation.en: -[Maya] Will I be normal? -[Beata] Yes. You are normal.
translation.zh: ‎我会正常吗？ ‎会 你很正常

translation.en: Yes, and you'll be very normal when you wake up.
translation.zh: ‎对 等你醒来 会非常正常

translation.en: -[Maya] I feel weird. -[Beata] You're not weird.
translation.zh:
‎-我感觉很奇怪
‎-不 你不奇怪

translation.en: [Maya] I feel very weird.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉很奇怪

translation.en: -[doctor 1] Has the… -[Maya] I feel very weird.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉很奇怪

translation.en: -[Beata] You're doing great. -[doctor 2] She's doing well. Responsive.
translation.zh: ‎你做得很好

translation.en: [lawyer 1] I'd like to go back to the ketamine coma in Mexico.
translation.zh: ‎我想聊聊在墨西哥的氯胺酮昏迷治疗

translation.en: Do you remember anything about that hospitalization?
translation.zh: ‎你记得那次住院治疗的任何事吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. I remember being in the room.
translation.zh: ‎对 我记得在房间里

translation.en: It was a higher dosage, and therefore,
translation.zh: ‎很高的剂量 ‎因此 我经历了更多副作用 例如幻觉

translation.en: I experienced more of the side effects, like the hallucinations.
translation.zh: ‎因此 我经历了更多副作用 例如幻觉

translation.en: But I know that my mom was there with me, and that helped.
translation.zh:
‎但我知道妈妈和我一起在那里
‎这对我很有帮助

translation.en: [Beata] Here is coma day one,
translation.zh: ‎这是昏迷第一天

translation.en: Wednesday, November 18th.
translation.zh: ‎11月18日 星期三

translation.en: Maya is doing well.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅状态很好

translation.en: Today is Friday, November 20th.
translation.zh: ‎今天是11月20日 星期五

translation.en: This is day three coma.
translation.zh: ‎这是昏迷第三天

translation.en: Maya is doing great.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅状态很棒

translation.en: It's coma day five.
translation.zh: ‎昏迷第五天

translation.en: She, uh, had a bad episode this morning of vomiting,
translation.zh: ‎今天早上她呕吐得很严重

translation.en: so they had to give her extra ketamine.
translation.zh: ‎所以他们不得不给她额外的氯胺酮

translation.en: This is coma day six, 11-22-15.
translation.zh: ‎今天是昏迷第六天 2015年11月22日

translation.en: I love you, Maya.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 玛雅

translation.en: Daddy loves you. Kyle loves you. Corinne loves you.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸爱你 凯尔爱你 科琳爱你

translation.en: Everybody loves you.
translation.zh: ‎每个人都爱你

translation.en: -[Beata] No! No, no, no, no. -[Maya screaming] [Beata] Keep that… Keep that on. Don't lift that.
translation.zh: ‎不！把那个放在外面 别拿起来

translation.en: -[Maya] Mommy! -[Beata] Yes, Mommy's right here.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈！
‎-嗯 妈妈就在这里

translation.en: -[Jack] Hey. -[Maya whimpering]
translation.zh: ‎喂

translation.en: -[Beata] I'm right here. -[Maya] Mommy, monster, monster, monster…
translation.zh:
‎-我就在这里
‎-妈妈 有怪物

translation.en: [Beata] No monsters. Mommy's here, and Mommy's not a monster, okay?
translation.zh:
‎没有怪物 妈妈在这儿
‎妈妈不是怪物 好吗？

translation.en: [doctor] Maya, remember… remember we were gonna ask you some questions?
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 记得我们要问你一些问题吗？

translation.en: Your mom wants to ask you some questions, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你妈妈想问你一些问题 好吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Jack] Okay, don't touch your glasses.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-好 别碰你的眼镜

translation.en: -[doctor] Okay, Mom? -Yes?
translation.zh:
‎-好 妈妈？
‎-嗯？

translation.en: -Hello, Maya. -Yes?
translation.zh:
‎-你好 玛雅
‎-嗯？

translation.en: -It's Mommy. You remember Mommy? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-是妈妈 你记得妈妈吗？
‎-记得

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay, good.
translation.zh: ‎好 很好

translation.en: -Who… Uh, what's the name of your brother? -Kylie.
translation.zh:
‎-你弟弟叫什么名字？
‎-凯尔

translation.en: -[Jack] Good girl! -[Beata] Wow!
translation.zh: ‎好女孩！

translation.en: [doctor] So she's doing fairly well, and she, um… She's got the wiggles.
translation.zh: ‎所以她情况不错 她可以扭动了

translation.en: That's not unexpected, and I would say she hasn't had any adverse hallucinations.
translation.zh:
‎这不是意料之外的
‎我会说她没有任何有害的幻觉

translation.en: -Would you agree? -I agree with that.
translation.zh:
‎-你同意吗？
‎-我同意

translation.en: [doctor] All right. So, Maya, here's one question.
translation.zh: ‎好 所以 玛雅 问你一个问题

translation.en: -Are you ready? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-准备好了吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: [doctor] Show me the sign, Maya.
translation.zh: ‎给我看看这个手势 玛雅

translation.en: -Show me the sign. -This.
translation.zh:
‎-给我看看这个手势
‎-这个

translation.en: [doctor] There you go! Hey! She's got it.
translation.zh: ‎很好！喂！ ‎她可以

translation.en: [chants] She's got it. She's got it!
translation.zh: ‎她可以

translation.en: [Jack] Maya came out of the coma, and she was better.
translation.zh:
‎玛雅从昏迷中苏醒了
‎她好一些了

translation.en: [chuckling] She said she was hungry, which was… a huge relief to hear.
translation.zh: ‎她说她饿了 听到这句话 我如释重负

translation.en: [Maya] The coma worked.
translation.zh: ‎昏迷疗法起作用了

translation.en: The ketamine helped me tremendously with my pain.
translation.zh: ‎氯胺酮对我的疼痛有很大的帮助

translation.en: I had a little bit of short-term memory loss,
translation.zh: ‎我有一点短期记忆丢失

translation.en: and sometimes things were really blurry with my vision,
translation.zh: ‎有时候我的视力变得很模糊

translation.en: but I was willing to have those side effects
translation.zh: ‎但是如果能整体帮助我

translation.en: if it was gonna help me overall.
translation.zh: ‎我愿意有这些副作用

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Okay, Maya. It's, uh, now January 6, and you had your ketamine coma.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 玛雅 现在是1月6日
‎你做过了氯胺酮昏迷治疗

translation.en: Now, having been through all that, is… was it worth it?
translation.zh: ‎现在经历了这一切 你觉得值得吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Beata] Helped a lot.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-有很大帮助

translation.en: -Especially with the headaches? -Yes, her headaches are a lot better.
translation.zh:
‎如果我理解正确的话
‎尤其对头痛有帮助 ‎-她的头痛好了很多
‎-对

translation.en: -[Kirkpatrick] Yep. -They're minor now. -Yeah. -[Kirkpatrick] Right.
translation.zh:
‎-头痛很轻了
‎-对

translation.en: -Her pain in the legs is better. -[Kirkpatrick] Right.
translation.zh:
‎-她的腿痛好多了
‎-对

translation.en: -It's getting-- -So… yeah.
translation.zh: ‎所以 对

translation.en: -[Kirkpatrick] Right-- -It's all better.
translation.zh:
‎-对…
‎-一切都在变好

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Let's do some testing, Maya. Are you ready for that?
translation.zh:
‎我们对你做一些检测吧 玛雅
‎你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Take that right hand, put it behind your head.
translation.zh: ‎举起你的右手 放在你的头后面

translation.en: You couldn't do that, no way, before. Any pain when you do that?
translation.zh:
‎以前你绝对做不到这样
‎当你这样的时候有任何疼痛吗？

translation.en: Not really, no.
translation.zh: ‎不太痛 没有

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] Not really, okay. Now do the other side, please.
translation.zh: ‎不太痛 好 现在来尝试另一边

translation.en: -Again, you couldn't do that before. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-这次也是 你以前做不到
‎-确实

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] And we talked about how important it is…
translation.zh: ‎我们讨论过那有多重要…

translation.en: [Jack] When we got back from Mexico,
translation.zh: ‎当我们从墨西哥回来

translation.en: we couldn't afford to keep up with Dr. Kirkpatrick's treatments,
translation.zh:
‎我们无法负担得起
‎继续柯帕里克医生的治疗

translation.en: so he recommended his colleague Dr. Hanna, who took our insurance
translation.zh:
‎所以他推荐了
‎接受我们保险的同事 汉纳医生

translation.en: and prescribed low dosages of ketamine for Maya.
translation.zh: ‎为玛雅开了低剂量的氯胺酮

translation.en: [Beata] That's better. I love you.
translation.zh: ‎这样好多了 我爱你

translation.en: [Maya] I love you too.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你

translation.en: [Beata] Now go down slowly.
translation.zh: ‎现在慢慢下来

translation.en: [Jack] She was getting stronger.
translation.zh: ‎她越来越有力量了

translation.en: -The dystonia was straightening out. -[Beata] Now smile. Good.
translation.zh: ‎肌张力障碍痊愈了

translation.en: [Jack] She was unable to use her legs, but she was using her arms,
translation.zh:
‎她无法控制她的腿
‎但她的胳膊可以控制

translation.en: and she was doing very, very well.
translation.zh: ‎她状况非常、非常好

translation.en: [Beata] I'm sure Maya's gonna need two doses of ketamine tonight after this.
translation.zh: ‎我确定这样做了之后 玛雅今晚 ‎会需要两倍剂量的氯胺酮

translation.en: [Jack] She went back to school, to laughing and playing.
translation.zh: ‎她回学校了 欢笑、玩耍

translation.en: We were blessed that we'd finally seen something working.
translation.zh: ‎我们觉得很幸运 最终看到了疗效

translation.en: And for a year, it did.
translation.zh: ‎一年内是有效的

translation.en: Until the night of the hurricane.
translation.zh: ‎直到那个飓风之夜

translation.en: [newsreader] Conditions were bad an hour ago.
translation.zh: ‎一小时前情况很糟糕

translation.en: They've gotten worse now as Hurricane Matthew
translation.zh:
‎现在随着飓风“马修”
‎在佛罗里达东海岸登陆

translation.en: makes its way up the east coast of Florida.
translation.zh: ‎情况变得更糟了

translation.en: Bridges are closed.
translation.zh: ‎桥被封闭了

translation.en: People have been told, wherever you are, hunker down.
translation.zh:
‎人们被告知无论在哪里
‎留在原地躲避

translation.en: It is too dangerous now to go outside.
translation.zh: ‎现在去外面太危险了

translation.en: [Jack] Maya relapsed.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅复发了

translation.en: It came back, and it was very severe.
translation.zh: ‎病发作了 而且非常严重

translation.en: She started complaining of pain in her tummy.
translation.zh: ‎她开始抱怨肚子痛

translation.en: And it got to the point where she was screaming and crying
translation.zh: ‎痛到了她尖叫哭泣

translation.en: and begging for help.
translation.zh: ‎乞求帮助的程度

translation.en: I contacted Beata at work.
translation.zh: ‎我联系了正在工作的贝亚特

translation.en: [Beata] Okay, hold on. Let me pull over to the side.
translation.zh: ‎好的 等一下 让我靠边停车

translation.en: [Jack] And I told her, "I have to take her into the emergency room."
translation.zh: ‎我告诉她“我必须把她带到急诊室”

translation.en: I remember pulling up at the doors.
translation.zh: ‎我记得在门口停车

translation.en: Go to triage,
translation.zh: ‎进行分类诊断

translation.en: and then you get the same questions again.
translation.zh: ‎然后你又被问到相同的问题

translation.en: The first nurse in triage had no idea what CRPS was.
translation.zh:
‎第一个分诊的护士不知道
‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征是什么

translation.en: And then the other ones as well,
translation.zh: ‎然后其他人也一样

translation.en: they wanted information and asked.
translation.zh: ‎他们想要信息 问我

translation.en: That's when I got my wife on the phone, and she talked to the doctor.
translation.zh:
‎就在这时我给我老婆打了电话
‎然后她和医生说

translation.en: [Beata] The pain meds are low-dose naltrexone
translation.zh: ‎止痛药是低剂量的纳曲酮

translation.en: and ketamine, oral, prescribed by her doctor.
translation.zh:
‎还有氯胺酮 口服
‎她的医生开的药方

translation.en: Her concern was merely administering ketamine,
translation.zh: ‎她关注的只是注射氯胺酮

translation.en: over and over, more and more and more.
translation.zh: ‎一遍又一遍 越来越多

translation.en: [Jack] Beata shows up an hour later.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特一小时后来了

translation.en: She was belligerent, demanding.
translation.zh: ‎她很挑衅 要求很高

translation.en: The mom was very controlling.
translation.zh: ‎那位母亲非常喜欢控制局面

translation.en: She told me, "This is what you're going to do."
translation.zh:
‎她告诉我
‎“这就是你要做的事情”

translation.en: [Jack] Beata's explaining to them
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特在给他们解释

translation.en: this is what needs to be done for the disease.
translation.zh: ‎这就是治疗这个病所需要做的

translation.en: [Beata] You don't understand her medical diagnosis.
translation.zh: ‎你不了解她的医学诊断

translation.en: You don't understand how much medication it takes to control her pain.
translation.zh:
‎你不知道要用多少药
‎来控制她的疼痛

translation.en: [Jack] But they just didn't understand.
translation.zh: ‎但是他们就是不明白

translation.en: [Sanchez] There are risks of respiratory failure, cardiac arrest.
translation.zh: ‎会有呼吸衰竭、心脏停搏的风险

translation.en: Her daughter could die from this,
translation.zh: ‎她的女儿可能因此而死

translation.en: and it didn't seem that she was, you know, worried about that.
translation.zh: ‎她似乎并不担心 女儿会因此而死

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Going back now to when you came to Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital
translation.zh: ‎现在回到2016年10月7日 你去

translation.en: on October 7 of 2016.
translation.zh: ‎约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院的时候

translation.en: Do you remember that day?
translation.zh: ‎你记得那天吗？

translation.en: I don't think I remember that exact day,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我记不清确切的那一天了

translation.en: but I do remember the very beginning of my stay at Johns Hopkins.
translation.zh:
‎但我确实记得
‎我在约翰·霍普金斯医院最初的住院

translation.en: I remember I was in a great deal of pain.
translation.zh: ‎我记得我当时很痛苦

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Was the pain in your stomach or foot?
translation.zh: ‎你胃痛还是脚痛？

translation.en: Was it all throughout your body?
translation.zh: ‎你的全身都痛吗？

translation.en: [Maya] My stomach, mainly. I was sent to the ER.
translation.zh: ‎主要是我的胃痛 我被送去了急诊室

translation.en: After that, I was transferred to the PICU, or whatever that was called,
translation.zh:
‎之后 我被转到了儿童重症监护室
‎或者不管那叫什么

translation.en: the intensive care unit or something.
translation.zh: ‎特护病房之类的

translation.en: That's most of what I remember.
translation.zh: ‎我基本就只记得这些了

translation.en: [Beata] They started Maya on low-dose ketamine, but that wasn't working.
translation.zh:
‎他们开始给玛雅注射低剂量的氯胺酮
‎但那没起作用

translation.en: [man] As the days progressed, we did not feel we made any effect to Maya's status.
translation.zh:
‎随着时间的流逝 我们不觉得
‎我们对玛雅的状况有任何效果

translation.en: We began questioning the diagnosis of complex generalized pain syndrome.
translation.zh:
‎我们开始怀疑
‎复杂性区域疼痛综合征的诊断

translation.en: Beata knew that low dosage wouldn't… wouldn't do it.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特知道低剂量不会奏效

translation.en: But they didn't listen.
translation.zh: ‎但他们不听

translation.en: At this time, things started to become belligerent.
translation.zh: ‎这时候 事情开始变成双方交战

translation.en: Things started becoming talks of leaving the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎事情开始变成谈论要离开医院

translation.en: That's where I started feeling unsafe about Maya.
translation.zh: ‎这时候我开始感觉玛雅不安全

translation.en: We were told if we planned on trying to leave,
translation.zh: ‎我们被告知 如果我们计划试图离开

translation.en: that security would be called.
translation.zh: ‎他们就会叫保安

translation.en: [Malik] And if you have a suspicion of child abuse,
translation.zh: ‎如果你怀疑发生了儿童虐待

translation.en: well, then, you're required to contact Child Protection Services.
translation.zh: ‎那你需要联系儿童保护服务

translation.en: Couple days later,
translation.zh: ‎几天后

translation.en: I was visiting Maya at Johns Hopkins.
translation.zh: ‎我在约翰·霍普金斯看望了玛雅

translation.en: At one point, the nurse walked out of the room,
translation.zh: ‎有一次 护士走出房间

translation.en: and in walked this woman with dark hair.
translation.zh: ‎和一个深色头发的女人走了进去

translation.en: [bailiff] Do you solemnly swear or affirm the testimony you give
translation.zh:
‎你是否严肃地发誓或者确认
‎即将给出的证词

translation.en: is the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh: ‎完全是真实的 没有半点虚假？

translation.en: -I do. -[lawyer 2] Your name, for the record.
translation.zh:
‎-我发誓
‎-请说出你的名字 方便记录

translation.en: Sally Marie Smith.
translation.zh: ‎莎莉·玛丽·史密斯

translation.en: [Jack] She never stated who she was.
translation.zh: ‎她从没说过自己是谁

translation.en: She just walked in, looked at me, looked at Maya.
translation.zh: ‎她只是走进来 看看我 看看玛雅

translation.en: She came in,
translation.zh: ‎她走进来

translation.en: and she acted like a regular doctor that worked for the hospital.
translation.zh:
‎她表现得像
‎在这个医院工作的普通医生

translation.en: And she started to ask questions.
translation.zh: ‎然后她开始问问题

translation.en: If they would've known who she was, we would have never spoken to her.
translation.zh:
‎如果他们知道她是谁
‎我们绝对不会跟她说话

translation.en: [Jack] She asked, "What's wrong with Maya? Where is she being treated?"
translation.zh:
‎她问“玛雅怎么了？
‎她在哪里接受治疗？”

translation.en: About medications.
translation.zh: ‎问了药物

translation.en: How could I let somebody give such high dosages?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么能让别人给了这么高的剂量？

translation.en: And I told her that's what the doctors prescribed.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉她 那是医生开的药方

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Dr. Hanna, I have 55 infusions here
translation.zh: ‎汉纳医生 从2016年1月初到10月6号

translation.en: ranging from early January to October 6 of 2016.
translation.zh: ‎我这里有55次输液

translation.en: I also understand that you wrote several prescriptions for oral ketamine
translation.zh:
‎我知道你也开了几次
‎口服氯胺酮药方

translation.en: to be used at home.
translation.zh: ‎让他们回家用

translation.en: -Do you remember doing that? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你记得那样做过吗？
‎-记得

translation.en: Is it possible that the abdominal pain was caused by these infusions?
translation.zh: ‎腹痛有可能是因为输液引起的吗？

translation.en: I mean, it can be a side effect.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 那可能是一个副作用

translation.en: Well, he was giving the child a thousand milligrams at a time,
translation.zh: ‎他每次给孩子一千毫克

translation.en: day after day, after day, after day.
translation.zh: ‎一天接一天 不断持续

translation.en: That is not routine ketamine dosing.
translation.zh: ‎那不是常规的氯胺酮剂量

translation.en: I have patients taking 1,500 milligram a day.
translation.zh: ‎我有病人每天服用1500毫克

translation.en: Every patient is different.
translation.zh: ‎每个病人情况都不一样

translation.en: Some patients develop tolerance,
translation.zh: ‎一些病人产生了耐药性

translation.en: or their disease process requires higher doses.
translation.zh:
‎或者他们的疾病发展了
‎需要更高的剂量

translation.en: A thousand milligram over four hours,
translation.zh: ‎四个小时给一千毫克

translation.en: that is what typically worked for her.
translation.zh: ‎通常对她是有效果的剂量

translation.en: [Smith] There were multiple physicians,
translation.zh: ‎有多个医生

translation.en: including, as documented in the, uh, report to the abuse hotline,
translation.zh: ‎包括给虐待热线打电话报告中记载的

translation.en: uh, who had concerns for Munchausen syndrome by proxy.
translation.zh: ‎担心有代理性佯病症

translation.en: -[man 1] Munchausen by proxy. -[man 2] Munchausen by proxy.
translation.zh:
‎-代理性佯病症
‎-代理性佯病症

translation.en: [woman] Munchausen's by proxy or medical child abuse.
translation.zh: ‎代理性佯病症 或者医疗虐待儿童

translation.en: Munchausen by proxy is a form of child abuse
translation.zh:
‎代理性佯病症
‎是虐待儿童的一种形式

translation.en: in which a caretaker provides
translation.zh: ‎孩子的监护人提供

translation.en: false or exaggerated information,
translation.zh: ‎错误或者夸张信息

translation.en: ignoring medical recommendations,
translation.zh: ‎无视医疗建议

translation.en: and that pattern of behavior causes harm to the child.
translation.zh: ‎而且种行为方式会对孩子造成伤害

translation.en: [Jack] She did a ten-minute interview at most,
translation.zh: ‎她最多就接受了十分钟的采访

translation.en: and shortly after, she walks out.
translation.zh: ‎然后不久就出去了

translation.en: [Smith] There was ample evidence to support a diagnosis of medical child abuse,
translation.zh:
‎有足够的证据支持
‎医疗儿童虐待诊断了

translation.en: and it appeared most likely
translation.zh: ‎看起来最有可能的是

translation.en: that Mrs. Kowalski was the primary one who was perpetrating the child abuse.
translation.zh: ‎考尔斯基太太是最主要虐待儿童的人

translation.en: The nurse walks back in that was helping me.
translation.zh: ‎护士走回去帮我

translation.en: She told me I had to leave.
translation.zh: ‎她告诉我 我必须离开

translation.en: That my daughter…
translation.zh: ‎我女儿…

translation.en: is under state custody.
translation.zh: ‎进入了州监护

translation.en: I remember looking in my daughter's eyes, and she's looking at me.
translation.zh:
‎我记得我看着我女儿的眼睛
‎她看着我

translation.en: I'm wondering if I would ever see her again.
translation.zh: ‎我在想 不知道以后还能否再见到她

translation.en: [Jack] They accused her of overmedicating Maya.
translation.zh: ‎他们控告她过度用药治疗玛雅

translation.en: And they thought Maya was faking this syndrome.
translation.zh: ‎他们以为玛雅在伪装这种综合征

translation.en: At that time, I said, "We need to get a hold of a lawyer."
translation.zh: ‎当时 我说我们需要找律师

translation.en: I met the Kowalskis in October of 2016, and when I first met Beata,
translation.zh: ‎我在2016年10月见了考尔斯基一家 ‎我第一次见到贝亚特的时候

translation.en: um, I was impressed by her knowledge of her child's illness.
translation.zh: ‎我很佩服她对孩子的病情的了解

translation.en: She had been through a lot.
translation.zh: ‎她经历了很多痛苦

translation.en: She had been to a lot of doctors trying to get her daughter care.
translation.zh:
‎她拜访过很多医生
‎尝试治疗她女儿的病情

translation.en: And she was very, very, very concerned about how Maya was going to do
translation.zh: ‎她非常、非常担心玛雅独自一个人

translation.en: being in the hospital and being isolated from them.
translation.zh: ‎在医院与他们分离 会怎么样

translation.en: She could not understand
translation.zh: ‎她不明白

translation.en: why the Department of Children and Families was doing this.
translation.zh: ‎为什么儿童与家庭部门要这样做

translation.en: I explained to both Jack and Beata
translation.zh: ‎我跟杰克和贝亚特两个人解释

translation.en: these types of cases are actually very common.
translation.zh: ‎这种类型的案子其实非常常见

translation.en: Child Protective Service investigators have incredible power to remove children.
translation.zh:
‎儿童保护服务调查员
‎有不可思议的权利带走孩子

translation.en: All they have to prove is that there's probable cause
translation.zh: ‎他们只需要证明可能有动机

translation.en: that there could be harm to the child.
translation.zh: ‎对孩子造成伤害

translation.en: In Florida, the child welfare system is privatized.
translation.zh:
‎在佛罗里达州
‎儿童福利体系是私有化的

translation.en: So when Sally Smith reviewed Maya's case,
translation.zh:
‎所以当莎莉·史密斯
‎审查玛雅案件的时候

translation.en: she was an employee for the Suncoast Center.
translation.zh: ‎她是阳光海岸中心的员工

translation.en: That center assists in investigating child-abuse allegations
translation.zh: ‎这个中心在皮内拉斯县

translation.en: in Pinellas County,
translation.zh: ‎协助调查儿童虐待指控

translation.en: where All Children's Hospital happens to be located.
translation.zh: ‎那个儿童医院刚好位于那里

translation.en: Children in Pinellas County are almost two and a half times more likely
translation.zh:
‎在皮内拉斯县的孩子
‎被从家庭带走的概率

translation.en: to be removed from their families than the state average.
translation.zh: ‎几乎比全国平均水平高2.5倍

translation.en: I now refer to it as the child-welfare industry.
translation.zh: ‎我现在称之为儿童福利行业

translation.en: But you have to remember something.
translation.zh: ‎但你必须记住一件事

translation.en: Back when Child Protective Services really started in this country in the '70s,
translation.zh:
‎70年代儿童保护服务
‎在国家启动的时候

translation.en: we were talking about children
translation.zh: ‎我们说的是那些遭受了 ‎过度身体惩罚的儿童

translation.en: that had suffered from excess corporal punishment,
translation.zh: ‎过度身体惩罚的儿童

translation.en: had been beaten,
translation.zh: ‎被打的儿童

translation.en: might've had broken bones or cigarette burns.
translation.zh: ‎可能有骨折或者烟头烫的儿童

translation.en: And we were talking about sexual abuse.
translation.zh: ‎我们谈论的是性虐待

translation.en: And while those cases are still happening,
translation.zh: ‎这类案件还在发生

translation.en: in recent years, we have a new diagnosis that's being used.
translation.zh: ‎近些年 我们使用了一个新的诊断

translation.en: Medical child abuse,
translation.zh: ‎医疗儿童虐待

translation.en: where any parent who's bringing in their child
translation.zh: ‎任何有不寻常疾病的孩子家长

translation.en: with an unusual illness to five different doctors
translation.zh: ‎去看五个不同的医生

translation.en: because you're trying to figure out what's wrong with your child,
translation.zh: ‎因为你想找出孩子的问题

translation.en: can be accused of doctor shopping
translation.zh: ‎都可能会被指控收买医生

translation.en: and exposing the child to unnecessary medical procedures
translation.zh: ‎让孩子接受不必要的医疗程序

translation.en: to fulfill their own mental health issue.
translation.zh: ‎去满足他们自己的心理健康问题

translation.en: [director] So, what was your personal assessment of Beata?
translation.zh:
‎所以 你对贝亚特
‎个人评价是怎样的？

translation.en: I think she could be, um…
translation.zh: ‎我觉得她可能…

translation.en: a little too direct sometimes,
translation.zh: ‎有时候有点过于直接

translation.en: and maybe… some of the doctors took that offensively.
translation.zh: ‎可能有些医生对此感到受到了冒犯

translation.en: I believe somebody at All Children's Hospital was offended,
translation.zh: ‎我认为在儿童医院 有人被冒犯到了

translation.en: and a conflict started.
translation.zh: ‎一个冲突就开始了

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] As soon as I was made aware
translation.zh: ‎一旦我知道

translation.en: that Sally Smith was investigating,
translation.zh: ‎莎莉·史密斯在调查

translation.en: I called her immediately,
translation.zh: ‎我马上打电话给她

translation.en: and I explained to her, "This is what the diagnosis is."
translation.zh: ‎我跟她解释了 这就是我的诊断

translation.en: "If you wanna see the objective evidence, I got it for you."
translation.zh:
‎如果你想看客观证据
‎我可以给你

translation.en: I told her that on the phone.
translation.zh: ‎我在电话里跟她这样说的

translation.en: She writes a report two days later.
translation.zh: ‎两天后她写了一份报告

translation.en: Did she include that in the report? No.
translation.zh: ‎她在报告里写了那个吗？没有

translation.en: I presented the information
translation.zh: ‎我提出这个信息

translation.en: to the best of my, uh, professional… ability
translation.zh: ‎是基于我的专业能力知识

translation.en: and, uh… came to a conclusion.
translation.zh: ‎然后得出了这个结论

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] I told her that if she goes forward with this,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉她 如果她继续推进

translation.en: it would not only be a catastrophic outcome for the child,
translation.zh:
‎这可能不只是对孩子
‎产生灾难性的后果

translation.en: it would be a permanent injury to the whole family.
translation.zh: ‎会给整个家庭带来永久性的伤害

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Did he warn you that your investigation could result
translation.zh:
‎他有没有警告过你
‎你的调查可能会对孩子和家庭

translation.en: in needless and permanent harm to the child and family?
translation.zh: ‎造成没有必要的永久性伤害？

translation.en: I don't know if he specifically said that.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他是否有说得这么具体

translation.en: I know he documented something some days later about our conversation.
translation.zh:
‎我知道他几天后记录了一些
‎关于我们谈话的事

translation.en: I read you what I wrote down.
translation.zh: ‎我把我写下的东西读给你听

translation.en: Um, I certainly will acknowledge
translation.zh: ‎我肯定会承认

translation.en: that, uh… investigation and medical evaluation
translation.zh:
‎对孩子虐待和疏忽进行的
‎调查和医疗评估

translation.en: for child abuse and neglect may cause some distress to a family.
translation.zh: ‎可能会给一个家庭造成一定的悲痛

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Is that how you would classify what happened to the Kowalskis?
translation.zh:
‎你会对考尔斯基家发生的事
‎进行这样的分类吗？

translation.en: Distress?
translation.zh: ‎悲痛？

translation.en: I don't know. You'd have to ask them how they responded to the whole thing.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 你必须要问他们
‎他们对整件事的反应如何

translation.en: Beata was focused on Maya's care.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特专心于照顾玛雅

translation.en: But my approach was
translation.zh: ‎但我的想法是

translation.en: not to cause any more tension between the hospital and our family.
translation.zh:
‎在医院和我们家人之间
‎别再引起任何冲突了

translation.en: Instead of embracing each other, it just… There was a blow-up.
translation.zh: ‎我们本应该拥抱彼此 ‎但却… 爆发了

translation.en: Our family was falling apart.
translation.zh: ‎我们的家庭在瓦解

translation.en: [Salisbury] The first phase of a dependency case is the shelter phase,
translation.zh: ‎抚养案的第一阶段是庇护阶段

translation.en: where the judge will decide where the child will be placed.
translation.zh: ‎法官会决定孩子将被安置在哪里

translation.en: They will have the Child Protection Services investigator's preliminary report
translation.zh:
‎他们会收到儿童保护服务
‎调查者的初步报告

translation.en: and have layers and layers of hearsay.
translation.zh: ‎听各种各样的传闻

translation.en: [woman 1] …suspicious to me…
translation.zh: ‎…令我生疑…

translation.en: [Salisbury] "This doctor said this. This doctor said that."
translation.zh:
‎这个医生说了这个
‎这个医生说了那个

translation.en: -[woman 2] …was a concern… -[Salisbury] It's all admissible.
translation.zh: ‎…有些担心… ‎法庭一切都会采纳

translation.en: [Salisbury] So it's easy for them to win,
translation.zh: ‎所以他们很容易就能赢

translation.en: and it makes families very vulnerable to the system.
translation.zh: ‎这让家庭在这个体系面前非常脆弱

translation.en: [judge] Good morning. We are here in the Kowalski matter
translation.zh:
‎（进入州监护的第一天） ‎早上好 我们在这里
‎就考尔斯基的事情

translation.en: for a shelter hearing as it relates to the child, Maya.
translation.zh: ‎举行与儿童玛雅有关的庇护听证会

translation.en: -[judge, continuing] I know that… -[commotion]
translation.zh: ‎是正确的 我知道…

translation.en: [Jack] Beata.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特

translation.en: -[shuffling] -Beata.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特

translation.en: [medic 1] Starting rescue in reference to a 50-year-old female.
translation.zh:
‎…提到一个50岁的女人
‎在法庭当场崩溃

translation.en: -Just collapsed in court. -[medic 2] Can you open your eyes?
translation.zh:
‎…提到一个50岁的女人
‎在法庭当场崩溃 ‎-你能睁开眼睛吗？
‎-患者在呼吸…

translation.en: -[medic 1] Subject is breathing… -[radio chatter]
translation.zh:
‎-你能睁开眼睛吗？
‎-患者在呼吸…

translation.en: -[medic 1] Beata. Hey. -[medic 2] Beata, can you hear us?
translation.zh:
‎-贝亚特 喂
‎-贝亚特 你能听到我们说话吗？

translation.en: -[medic 1] Beata? Can you open your eyes? -[medic 2] Can you open your eyes for me?
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特？你能为我睁开双眼吗？

translation.en: [Jack] Beata fell to the ground, smacking her head on the floor.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特倒在地上 把头撞向地板

translation.en: [Salisbury] Maya was placed in Child Protection Services custody
translation.zh:
‎玛雅被安置在
‎约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院

translation.en: at Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital.
translation.zh: ‎由儿童保护服务监护

translation.en: Her treatment regimen was changed
translation.zh: ‎她的治疗方案被改变了

translation.en: because they said that Beata had Munchausen syndrome by proxy.
translation.zh:
‎因为他们说贝亚特
‎得了代理性佯病症

translation.en: [Jack] The judge said that Beata had to go for psychological evaluation.
translation.zh: ‎法官说贝亚特必须去做个心理评估

translation.en: [Salisbury] Beata had a psychological exam done,
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特完成了心理测试

translation.en: and the findings were
translation.zh: ‎结果是

translation.en: that she did not have Munchausen syndrome by proxy,
translation.zh: ‎她并没有代理性佯病症

translation.en: but she had an adjustment disorder with depressed mood
translation.zh: ‎但她有适应性障碍 情绪低落

translation.en: from having her child taken away.
translation.zh: ‎因为她的孩子被带走而情绪低落

translation.en: And naturally, by being attacked by the system.
translation.zh: ‎这很自然 被这个体系攻击了

translation.en: [lawyer 3] Um, Maya, do you remember anyone at the hospital
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 你记得有医院的人

translation.en: telling you why you were being separated from your parents?
translation.zh:
‎告诉你为什么
‎你和父母被分隔开了吗？

translation.en: [Maya] No one ever told me directly.
translation.zh: ‎没有人直接告诉过我

translation.en: I kind of had to figure that out.
translation.zh: ‎我只能自己去猜测

translation.en: [lawyer 3] Did you have a sense?
translation.zh: ‎你有感觉到吗？

translation.en: You were only ten back then,
translation.zh: ‎你当时只有十岁

translation.en: but did you have a sense of what was going on?
translation.zh: ‎但你有感觉到发生了什么吗？

translation.en: I was so confused.
translation.zh: ‎我当时非常困惑

translation.en: Like, I asked so many questions, and they would never answer me.
translation.zh:
‎我问了很多问题
‎他们从来不会回答我

translation.en: They would just say, "You can't talk to them."
translation.zh:
‎他们只会说
‎“你不能和他们说话”

translation.en: So I really had no idea.
translation.zh: ‎所以我真的不知道

translation.en: [Jack] There was a time where I was finally allowed to go see Maya.
translation.zh: ‎有段时间我终于被允许去见玛雅了

translation.en: But there's a lot of rules that I had to follow.
translation.zh: ‎但是有很多我必须遵守的规矩

translation.en: I wasn't allowed to ask how she was doing, about her treatments.
translation.zh:
‎我不被允许问她怎么样了
‎她的治疗情况

translation.en: I couldn't answer when she was coming home.
translation.zh: ‎我不能回答她什么时候回家

translation.en: Couldn't answer much about Mom.
translation.zh: ‎不能回答和妈妈相关的太多

translation.en: The visit was very brief,
translation.zh: ‎这次会面很简短

translation.en: and it was very difficult,
translation.zh: ‎非常艰难

translation.en: because seen her condition just going downhill.
translation.zh: ‎因为我正看着她的病情每况愈下

translation.en: So her feet turned in more.
translation.zh: ‎说她的脚更弯了

translation.en: She had more lesions.
translation.zh: ‎她产生了更多皮肤损伤

translation.en: And just seeing her getting weaker and weaker,
translation.zh: ‎只能看着她越来越虚弱

translation.en: that was the most frustrating thing of all.
translation.zh: ‎这是最令人沮丧的事情

translation.en: So when I come home from visiting Maya,
translation.zh: ‎所以当我看望完玛雅回家后

translation.en: Beata wanted to know how her little girl's doing.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特想知道她的小女儿怎么样了

translation.en: She wants to know if they're doing procedures
translation.zh: ‎她想知道他们是否在治疗

translation.en: or giving meds and this and that.
translation.zh: ‎给她服药 这个那个的

translation.en: And I couldn't say anything.
translation.zh: ‎我什么都不能说

translation.en: You know, I can't… If I start doing that,
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我不能… ‎如果我开始那样做

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my privileges as a father to go see my daughter,
translation.zh:
‎我会失去我作为父亲
‎去看望我女儿的权利

translation.en: and our daughter needs somebody to come see her.
translation.zh: ‎我们的女儿需要有人去看望

translation.en: So I'd stay quiet.
translation.zh: ‎所以我会保持沉默

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Kyle, did you have a chance to visit your sister
translation.zh:
‎凯尔 你姐姐在
‎约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院

translation.en: at Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital when she was hospitalized there?
translation.zh: ‎住院期间 你有没有机会探望她？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎有

translation.en: [lawyer 1] How did your sister appear to you when you would go visit her at the hospital?
translation.zh:
‎你在医院看望你姐姐的时候
‎在你看来 她怎么样？

translation.en: She appeared like she did not wanna be there.
translation.zh: ‎她看起来不想待在那儿

translation.en: [Maya] It was hard for me to be without my parents,
translation.zh: ‎没有父母对我来说很难

translation.en: and it was hard to put all this trust into people I didn't even know.
translation.zh: ‎我很难完全相信我根本不认识的人

translation.en: They even said that it's all in Maya's head.
translation.zh: ‎他们甚至说这一切都是玛雅幻想的

translation.en: "The kid's sick."
translation.zh: ‎这孩子病了

translation.en: "She's trying to tell people what's wrong with her,
translation.zh: ‎她尝试告诉人们她怎么了

translation.en: and nobody's listening."
translation.zh: ‎没有人听

translation.en: That's incorrect. I know my daughter.
translation.zh: ‎这不对 我了解我的女儿

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Do you think that she improved
translation.zh:
‎你认为她在
‎约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院住院后

translation.en: from the time that she was admitted to JHACH?
translation.zh: ‎情况是否有改善？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎有

translation.en: She gained weight.
translation.zh: ‎她还长胖了

translation.en: She was weaned off numerous medications.
translation.zh: ‎她被中断了多种药物

translation.en: She was no longer having abdominal pain.
translation.zh: ‎她的腹部不再疼痛

translation.en: [lawyer 3] From the time you came into All Children's,
translation.zh: ‎从你进入儿童医院那时起

translation.en: did your pain ever improve?
translation.zh: ‎你的疼痛有改善过吗？

translation.en: -[lawyer 4] Object to form. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-表示异议
‎-没有

translation.en: No, not really.
translation.zh:
‎-表示异议
‎-没有 ‎并非如此

translation.en: Like, I was in constant pain.
translation.zh: ‎我始终处于疼痛中

translation.en: And with CRPS, when it's left untreated,
translation.zh:
‎得了复杂性区域疼痛综合征
‎如果不去进行治疗

translation.en: like, without medication and without the proper physical therapy…
translation.zh: ‎比如 没有药物没有合理的理疗

translation.en: Uh, also without a support system, that definitely plays into it.
translation.zh:
‎身边也没有支持的人
‎这绝对影响很大

translation.en: But… it's, like, almost impossible to improve.
translation.zh: ‎但是改善几乎是不可能的

translation.en: So, even though doctors came in and out of my room,
translation.zh: ‎所以 即使医生进进出出我的房间

translation.en: um, I was never listened to. I was basically ignored.
translation.zh:
‎我从来没有被倾听过
‎我基本被忽视了

translation.en: Five minutes or two minutes, that's all it is.
translation.zh: ‎五分钟或两分钟 就这样

translation.en: [Kirkpatrick] This was not the first time I've seen this type of scenario.
translation.zh: ‎这不是我第一次看到这种场景了

translation.en: After a few days at the hospital, they refused to give her ketamine.
translation.zh: ‎住院几天后 他们拒绝给她氯胺酮

translation.en: And without the high-dose ketamine treatment,
translation.zh: ‎没有高剂量的氯胺酮治疗

translation.en: she had virtually no mobility in her legs at all.
translation.zh: ‎事实上她的腿真的完全不能动了

translation.en: That's where you get blood clots forming, which can break off, go to the lungs,
translation.zh:
‎这就会形成血凝块
‎可能会破裂 进入到肺里

translation.en: and it could be fatal.
translation.zh: ‎可能会致命

translation.en: And I felt it was important
translation.zh: ‎我感觉贝亚特

translation.en: that Beata understood the seriousness of this.
translation.zh: ‎明白这件事的严重性

translation.en: So I warned her, in all medical probability, that Maya would die a slow, painful death.
translation.zh:
‎我警告过她 在所有医疗的可能性中
‎玛雅会慢慢痛苦地死去

translation.en: One social worker at Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital
translation.zh: ‎约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院的一个社工

translation.en: was assigned to my daughter.
translation.zh: ‎被分配给了我女儿

translation.en: -Please state your name for the record. -Catherine R. Bedy.
translation.zh:
‎-请你陈述姓名 方便记录
‎-凯瑟琳·贝蒂

translation.en: Something didn't seem right with her,
translation.zh: ‎就感觉她有点不对劲

translation.en: so we googled her name.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们谷歌搜索了她的名字

translation.en: The first thing that came up was she was arrested for child abuse.
translation.zh:
‎出现的第一条内容就是
‎她因为虐待儿童被捕

translation.en: Beata is falsely being accused of child abuse,
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特被错误地起诉虐待儿童

translation.en: and she was on that other side of the phone knowing this
translation.zh: ‎而她在电话的另一端知道这件事

translation.en: and not being able to do anything for her child.
translation.zh: ‎没办法为孩子做任何事

translation.en: [Beata] You just woke up?
translation.zh: ‎你刚醒吗？

translation.en: [Maya] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: -[Beata] Who's with you today? -[Maya] Cathi.
translation.zh: ‎今天谁跟你在一起？

translation.en: -[Beata sighs] -[Bedy] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-凯瑟琳
‎-好

translation.en: [Beata] You know, she's really interrupting, because I hear her talking in the background.
translation.zh:
‎你知道嘛 她有点打扰我们
‎因为我听到在背景有说话声

translation.en: -[Bedy] Mom? -[Beata] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈？
‎-是的

translation.en: [Bedy] You need to redirect.
translation.zh: ‎你需要换话题

translation.en: [Beata] I will redirect. I'm just telling you this is my time with my daughter.
translation.zh:
‎我会换话题 我只是告诉你
‎这是我跟我女儿的时间

translation.en: [Bedy] Mom, please redirect.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 你快换话题吧

translation.en: [Jack] I later found out the charges were dropped.
translation.zh: ‎我之后才发现 起诉被撤销了

translation.en: But it set off alarms with Beata.
translation.zh: ‎但是引起了贝亚特的注意

translation.en: Cathi Bedy told me that I was gonna go into a foster home.
translation.zh:
‎凯瑟琳·贝蒂告诉我
‎我要进入寄养家庭

translation.en: She told me that my mom was in a mental institution.
translation.zh: ‎她告诉我 我妈妈在精神病院

translation.en: She told me that she was gonna end up adopting me.
translation.zh: ‎她告诉我 她最后要收要我

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Did you ever sit Maya on your lap?
translation.zh: ‎你有让玛雅坐在你的大腿上吗？

translation.en: [Bedy] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎有

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Were you hugging Maya?
translation.zh: ‎你是在抱玛雅吗？

translation.en: Um, I think that we provide comfort to a lot of kids so, uh…
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们对很多孩子
‎都提供这样的舒适

translation.en: probably whilst she was sitting on my lap, I'm sure I did hug her.
translation.zh:
‎可能她坐在我腿上的时候
‎我应该抱了她的

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Do you think Maya liked you?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得玛雅喜欢你吗？

translation.en: [lawyer 4] Object to form.
translation.zh: ‎表示异议

translation.en: Um, yeah, and…
translation.zh: ‎对 然后…

translation.en: I also think that there were times that Maya was very mad
translation.zh: ‎我也觉得有时候玛雅非常生气

translation.en: because I happened to be the face of the hospital,
translation.zh: ‎因为我算是医院出头的脸面

translation.en: along with the doctors.
translation.zh: ‎跟其他医生一起

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Do you remember being told why they wanted to take photos of you?
translation.zh:
‎你记得他们告诉过你
‎为什么要给你拍照吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Cathi Bedy came over to my bed,
translation.zh: ‎对 凯瑟琳·贝蒂来到我床边

translation.en: and she was like,
translation.zh: ‎她说

translation.en: "If you wanna go to the court hearing, I have to do this."
translation.zh:
‎“如果你想要去法院的听证会
‎我就必须这样做”

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Risk management made the decision to have these pictures taken of Maya?
translation.zh:
‎风险管理部门决定
‎拍这些玛雅的照片？

translation.en: -Yep. -She removed my clothes…
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-她脱了我的衣服

translation.en: She was in her sports bra and a pair of shorts.
translation.zh: ‎她穿着运动内衣和短裤

translation.en: …held me down, took photos of me.
translation.zh: ‎让我不要动 给我拍照

translation.en: We took pictures of her arms, her legs, her face, and her stomach.
translation.zh:
‎我们给她的手臂、腿
‎脸和肚子拍了照片

translation.en: I was screaming, crying, yelling "No."
translation.zh: ‎我在尖叫 哭着大喊“不要”

translation.en: [lawyer 2] She did not want you to take pictures of her like that, did she?
translation.zh: ‎她不想让你们给她那样拍照 是吧？

translation.en: She did not.
translation.zh: ‎不想

translation.en: Could not have made it any more clear.
translation.zh: ‎我已经说得不能更清楚了

translation.en: [lawyer 2] But you went ahead and took pictures of her anyway.
translation.zh: ‎但你们还是继续给她拍照了

translation.en: Unfortunately, we did.
translation.zh: ‎很不幸 确实如此

translation.en: [lawyer 2] What steps were taken to call the parents
translation.zh: ‎你们进行了怎样的措施询问父母

translation.en: and ask whether you could take pictures of their child like this?
translation.zh: ‎是否可以给他们的孩子这样拍照？

translation.en: We didn't call the parents.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有给父母打电话

translation.en: [Maya] I missed Halloween, Thanksgiving, my birthday,
translation.zh:
‎我错过了万圣节、感恩节
‎我的生日

translation.en: and all I could think about was when could I go home and see my mom.
translation.zh:
‎我能想的只有
‎我什么时候能回家见妈妈

translation.en: [Beata] Hi, Maya. How are you, sweetie pie?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 玛雅 你怎么样了 小可爱？

translation.en: [Maya] I'm really not feeling well.
translation.zh: ‎我真的感觉很不舒服

translation.en: [Beata] You're not feeling good?
translation.zh: ‎你感觉不舒服？

translation.en: [Maya] Everything is hard for me.
translation.zh: ‎一切对我来说都很难

translation.en: I cry a lot.
translation.zh: ‎我经常哭

translation.en: [Beata] So the tramadol doesn't do anything for you?
translation.zh: ‎所以曲马多对你来说没有任何作用？

translation.en: -[Maya] No, not at all. -[Beata sighs]
translation.zh: ‎没有 一点都没有

translation.en: What else are you getting for pain? -[Maya] Nothing else.
translation.zh:
‎-你还吃了什么治疗疼痛？
‎-没有别的了

translation.en: [Beata] Well, I'm very sorry, honey.
translation.zh: ‎我很抱歉 宝贝

translation.en: I wish I was there to rub your back and hug you.
translation.zh:
‎真希望我能在那里
‎抚摸你的后背 拥抱你

translation.en: [Maya] Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: ‎对 我也是

translation.en: [Beata] Oh, did you get that letter I wrote to you?
translation.zh: ‎你收到我给你信了吗？

translation.en: -From, um… -[Maya] No. [Beata] …Miss Cathi?
translation.zh:
‎-凯瑟琳小姐给你了吗？
‎-没有

translation.en: -[Maya] What? -[Bedy] Miss Cathi has no letter from you.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-凯瑟琳姐没有给你信

translation.en: [Beata] Okay, I sent it to Charlotte.
translation.zh: ‎好 我寄给夏洛特的

translation.en: [Bedy] You'll have to talk with Charlotte.
translation.zh: ‎你要跟夏洛特聊聊这件事

translation.en: [Beata] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Have you been able to talk to your attorney?
translation.zh: ‎你有机会跟律师聊过吗？

translation.en: [Maya] Yeah. He's gonna come today.
translation.zh: ‎对 他今天要来

translation.en: [Beata] Oh good. I just wanna make sure that you are able to talk to him.
translation.zh: ‎好 我只想确保你能跟他聊

translation.en: [Maya] Well, on the phone I'm not, because I can't call outside.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法在电话里聊
‎因为我不能给外界打电话

translation.en: [Beata] What do you mean, you can't call outside?
translation.zh: ‎什么叫你不能给外界打电话？

translation.en: You are not in a prison, and you're not in a Nazi camp.
translation.zh: ‎你不是蹲监狱 你不是在纳粹集中营

translation.en: -[Bedy] Mom… Um, Mom. -[Beata] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈
‎-是

translation.en: [Bedy] She just has to ask the nurse how to do it. That's all.
translation.zh: ‎她必须问护士怎样做 仅此而已

translation.en: [Beata] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [sighs] How was your Thanksgiving?
translation.zh: ‎你感恩节过得怎么样？

translation.en: It wasn't really good.
translation.zh: ‎不太好

translation.en: [Beata] I know.
translation.zh: ‎我知道

translation.en: It was the worst Thanksgiving ever for me.
translation.zh: ‎那是我最糟糕的一个感恩节

translation.en: [Maya] I don't understand why this happened, you know?
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 为什么会这样 你知道吗？

translation.en: [Beata] Yeah, we… It's very difficult. It's very complicated.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 很难 很复杂

translation.en: [Maya] I mean, nothing's happened wrong, and we're suffering now.
translation.zh:
‎发生的事情并没有错
‎我们现在很痛苦

translation.en: -[Beata] I know. I'm very sorry, honey. -[Maya sighs]
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我很抱歉 宝贝

translation.en: [Beata] Very sorry. Just be strong, okay?
translation.zh: ‎非常抱歉 你要坚强 好吗？

translation.en: [Maya, shakily] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Beata] I pray for you every day.
translation.zh: ‎我每天都在为你祈祷

translation.en: [Maya] Me too.
translation.zh: ‎我也是

translation.en: [Beata] So be strong.
translation.zh: ‎一定要坚强

translation.en: [Maya] I'm trying.
translation.zh: ‎我在努力

translation.en: -[Beata] Okay. -[Maya sniffles]
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Bedy] Mom? We have to say goodbye.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈？我们要说再见了

translation.en: I have to step into something else right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在要去做别的事情了

translation.en: [Beata] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: -Thank you, Maya. -[Maya] I love you, Mommy. -[Beata] I love you. Bye-bye. -[Maya] Bye-bye, Mommy.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 玛雅 我爱你 再见
‎-我爱你 妈妈 再见

translation.en: [Jack] I don't know if it was questioning Maya on her treatments
translation.zh: ‎我不知道那是否是在质疑玛雅的治疗

translation.en: or what they're giving her
translation.zh: ‎或者他们给她用了什么

translation.en: or certain things that she can't discuss with her daughter,
translation.zh: ‎或者某些她无法跟女儿讨论的事情

translation.en: but unfortunately, Cathi Bedy accused Beata
translation.zh: ‎但很不幸 凯瑟琳·贝蒂指控贝亚特

translation.en: of being inappropriate during that phone conversation.
translation.zh: ‎在电话对话中言语不当

translation.en: And she tried to get Beata's privileges suspended.
translation.zh: ‎她试着停止贝亚特的权利

translation.en: Beata, as strong as she is, it just destroyed her.
translation.zh:
‎虽然贝亚特很坚强
‎这也给了她惨重打击

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Mr. Kowalski, were you aware that your wife was the subject
translation.zh: ‎考尔斯基先生 你有意识到你妻子是

translation.en: of a pending criminal investigation by the Sarasota County Sheriff's Office?
translation.zh:
‎萨拉索塔县警长办公室
‎正在调查案件的嫌疑人吗？

translation.en: I never heard there was a pending investigation.
translation.zh:
‎我从来没听说过
‎有正在进行调查的案件

translation.en: [lawyer 1] I believe you sat down and gave a recorded statement to Detective Graham.
translation.zh:
‎我相信你跟格拉哈姆警探聊过
‎进行了录音陈述

translation.en: Am I correct?
translation.zh: ‎我说得没错吧？

translation.en: Yes, I sat down with her, but I did not know I was being recorded.
translation.zh:
‎对 我跟她聊了
‎但我当时不知道被录音了

translation.en: I did not give consent to be recorded.
translation.zh: ‎我没有同意进行录音

translation.en: [lawyer 2] You told them that you were a detective investigating child abuse, did you not?
translation.zh:
‎你告诉他们
‎你是调查儿童虐待案的警探 是吧？

translation.en: I would've had my badge and gone on and probably identified myself, yes.
translation.zh:
‎我应该出示了警徽 打开录音
‎应该说明了自己的身份 对

translation.en: I asked if I could interview him,
translation.zh: ‎我询问是否可以采访他

translation.en: and we sat down, and we had a… pleasant conversation.
translation.zh: ‎我们坐下来 进行了非常愉悦的对话

translation.en: [Graham] Um…
translation.zh: ‎（格拉哈姆警探问讯的录音）

translation.en: Could you tell me a little about you and your wife's relationship?
translation.zh: ‎你可以给我讲讲你和妻子的关系吗？

translation.en: [Jack] It's like any marriage. You've got your ups and downs.
translation.zh: ‎跟任何婚姻一样 有起起伏伏

translation.en: And sure, you're not gonna agree on everything. -You know? -[Graham] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎不是所有的事情
‎都能认同彼此 对吧？

translation.en: Do you guys ever disagree on Maya's care?
translation.zh:
‎你们对玛雅的护理上
‎有意见不一致过吗？

translation.en: [Jack] No. I know my wife. She…
translation.zh: ‎没有 我了解我妻子

translation.en: She'll stay up till three in the morning, you know, doing research or whatever.
translation.zh:
‎她会熬夜到凌晨三点
‎进行搜索研究之类的

translation.en: I kind of listen to what she says with that and the doctors.
translation.zh:
‎玛雅的病情问题
‎我基本听她和医生的话

translation.en: Number one is the doctors.
translation.zh: ‎医生是第一位

translation.en: [Graham] Is Maya looking for some… attention from her mom?
translation.zh: ‎玛雅想寻求她母亲的关注吗？

translation.en: Trying to please her mom? Mom wants her to be sick.
translation.zh:
‎试图取悦她母亲？ ‎妈妈想让她生病
‎所以我要生病 去取悦我母亲

translation.en: -So "I'm gonna be sick to please my mom"? -[Jack] I hope not. God, I hope not.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈想让她生病
‎所以我要生病 去取悦我母亲 ‎天啊 希望没有

translation.en: [Graham] Let's not differentiate love and affection and caring… -[Jack] Mm-hmm. -[Graham] …for abuse.
translation.zh:
‎我们不要把爱和感情
‎还有照顾虐待区分开来

translation.en: -Because they can happen in tandem. -[Jack] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎因为这些可以同时发生 ‎好

translation.en: I don't agree with her on a lot of things, but I'll tell you what,
translation.zh:
‎很多事情我都跟她意见不统一
‎但我这样告诉你

translation.en: intentionally, she would never hurt her children.
translation.zh: ‎她永远不会故意伤害自己的孩子

translation.en: I'd swear on my life on that one.
translation.zh: ‎我可以用生命发誓

translation.en: -[Graham] Do you love your wife? -[Jack] I love her, yeah. I just…
translation.zh:
‎-你爱你妻子吗？
‎-爱 对 ‎我只是…

translation.en: She is a pushy person,
translation.zh: ‎她有点强势

translation.en: and it's getting worse right now.
translation.zh: ‎现在情况更严重了

translation.en: Just, you know, she don't wanna cooperate.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 她不想配合

translation.en: -[Graham] This is a complicated case. -[Jack] Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-这是一个复杂的案子
‎-当然

translation.en: [Graham] And… I think it…
translation.zh: ‎我觉得非常有可能

translation.en: it could be very possible someone could be looking at criminal charges.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得非常有可能 ‎有人想要进行刑事起诉

translation.en: -[Jack] Hmm. -[Graham] Which is why I'm asking you.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才问你

translation.en: Are you protective, or are you complicit?
translation.zh: ‎你是保护孩子的 还是共谋？

translation.en: [Jack] Protective of my children.
translation.zh: ‎保护我的孩子

translation.en: [Graham] Are your children truly your first priority?
translation.zh: ‎你的孩子真是你的第一位吗？

translation.en: [Jack] I swear on my life, and my children's lives.
translation.zh: ‎我以我孩子的性命发誓

translation.en: [Graham] I don't care.
translation.zh:
‎我不在乎 我明天就把你和你妻子
‎送进监狱

translation.en: I'll put you and your wife in jail tomorrow if it meant Maya gets better.
translation.zh:
‎我不在乎 我明天就把你和你妻子
‎送进监狱 ‎-只要能让玛雅变好
‎-如果我做错了 你把我送进监狱

translation.en: -[Jack] If I did wrong, put me in jail. -[Graham] Absolutely.
translation.zh:
‎-只要能让玛雅变好
‎-如果我做错了 你把我送进监狱 ‎-当然
‎-好 我接受

translation.en: [Jack] Yes, I accept that.
translation.zh:
‎-当然
‎-好 我接受

translation.en: [Graham] Let me ask you. If Maya was released tomorrow,
translation.zh: ‎让我问你 如果玛雅明天被释放了

translation.en: would you be compliant
translation.zh: ‎如果这个孩子不能跟母亲

translation.en: if that child was not to have any contact with her mother?
translation.zh: ‎有任何接触 你会顺从吗？

translation.en: [Jack] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎会

translation.en: In a heartbeat.
translation.zh: ‎毫不犹豫

translation.en: [director] So did they want Jack to turn on Beata?
translation.zh: ‎所以他们是想让杰克背叛贝亚特？

translation.en: I would assume that they did.
translation.zh: ‎我认为是这样的

translation.en: That would've made their case easier.
translation.zh: ‎这会让他们的案子容易很多

translation.en: [director] He said that he would choose his kids over his wife.
translation.zh:
‎他说会在自己的孩子
‎和妻子之间 选择孩子

translation.en: That's what he's supposed to say.
translation.zh: ‎他应该这样说

translation.en: If you say otherwise, it will be held against you.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不这样说 就会对你不利

translation.en: That is the only correct answer.
translation.zh: ‎这是唯一正确的答案

translation.en: I did go home. I told Beata what happened.
translation.zh: ‎我回到家 告诉贝亚特发生了什么

translation.en: Yeah. It's… "What'd you say? Why did you do this? Why…"
translation.zh:
‎对“你说了什么？
‎你为什么这样？为什么…”

translation.en: I told her, "I have nothing to hide."
translation.zh: ‎我告诉她 我没有什么好隐藏的

translation.en: [grunts] I told her exactly that "They're trying to blame you,"
translation.zh:
‎我很清楚地告诉她
‎他们想赖在你身上

translation.en: and… and then it just… it caused a lot of stress in the house.
translation.zh: ‎这话在家中造成了很大的压力

translation.en: I'm sure she felt very much betrayed. Mm.
translation.zh: ‎我相信她感到深深被背叛了

translation.en: [judge] Ms. Bedy, you'd said before you thought Maya was happy and thriving
translation.zh: ‎贝蒂女士 你说过 玛雅在你的照顾

translation.en: under your care and the care of the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎和医院的监护下 在开心快乐成长

translation.en: [Bedy] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: Maya was moving her legs, moving her hands without any pain.
translation.zh:
‎玛雅可以没有疼痛地
‎移动她的腿和手臂

translation.en: She was out playing the piano downstairs
translation.zh: ‎她走出病房 去楼下弹钢琴

translation.en: and often moved herself around the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎经常在医院自由移动自己

translation.en: So we saw her getting better.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们看到她好转了

translation.en: [judge] Do you have any response to that?
translation.zh: ‎你对此要做出回应吗？

translation.en: RSD is a disease, and every day, it looks a little bit different.
translation.zh: ‎反射性交感神经营养不良是一种病 ‎每天都会看起来不一样

translation.en: There are certain days that I could do certain things,
translation.zh: ‎有些日子我可以做某些事情

translation.en: and there are other days, where I can't do those things.
translation.zh: ‎而换一天 我可能就做不到那些事情

translation.en: So depending on the days, it's gonna look different.
translation.zh:
‎所以选的日子不一样
‎看起来也会不一样

translation.en: So, yes, they are wrong there.
translation.zh: ‎所以 没错 他们错了

translation.en: When we look at pain, and when I see kids in pain,
translation.zh: ‎当我们看疼痛 当我看到孩子疼痛

translation.en: Maya never showed some of the symptoms that we see other kids in pain having.
translation.zh:
‎玛雅从来没有表现出
‎我们在其他疼痛孩子身上看到的症状

translation.en: [Maya] Dear your honor. Love, Maya.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的法官 爱你的玛雅

translation.en: Hello, it's Maya, and I wanted to write you a note.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我是玛雅 我想给你写一个留言

translation.en: First of all, I wanted to thank you for taking your time working on this case.
translation.zh:
‎首先 我想感谢你花时间
‎研究我的案子

translation.en: And I know that you know I want to go home.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 你知道我想回家

translation.en: I've been feeling terrible the last few days.
translation.zh: ‎过去几天中 我感觉很糟糕

translation.en: I have been getting worse and worse.
translation.zh: ‎我的情况越来越严重了

translation.en: All I want for Christmas is my family.
translation.zh: ‎我圣诞节想要的只有我的家人

translation.en: I cry every day, and it makes me feel sad.
translation.zh: ‎我每天都哭 这让我感觉很悲伤

translation.en: I never got to say my goodbyes to my mom.
translation.zh: ‎我始终没能跟我妈妈道别

translation.en: I pray every day that I will be able to go home.
translation.zh: ‎我每天都祈祷能回家

translation.en: [Salisbury] In the middle of December 2016,
there was a hearing scheduled, a status conference.
translation.zh: ‎安排了一场听证会 进度讨论会

translation.en: We were constantly having status conferences,
translation.zh: ‎我们经常进行进度讨论会

translation.en: and Varinia Van Ness came on as cocounsel.
translation.zh:
‎瓦利尼亚·凡尼斯
‎作为协理律师过来了

translation.en: [Salisbury] This was a huge power struggle.
translation.zh: ‎这是一场巨大的权力斗争

translation.en: But no matter what we did,
translation.zh: ‎但不管我们做什么

translation.en: the court repetitively sided
translation.zh: ‎法院始终不停地

translation.en: with the hospital staff and Dr. Sally Smith.
translation.zh:
‎跟医院雇员
‎还有莎莉·史密斯站在一边

translation.en: [Salisbury] It never made any sense to me
translation.zh: ‎我一直无法理解

translation.en: why she was denied giving her child that hug.
translation.zh: ‎为什么要拒绝她给孩子一个拥抱

translation.en: And I can tell you, as we left the courthouse that day,
translation.zh: ‎我可以告诉你 我们那天离开法院后

translation.en: that Beata was devastated.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特很受打击

translation.en: Devastated.
translation.zh: ‎很受打击

translation.en: And the one thing that I know to this day
translation.zh: ‎事情发展到今天 我知道了

translation.en: is none of us can get that hug back now.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在谁都没办法要回那个拥抱了

translation.en: That hug is gone.
translation.zh: ‎那个拥抱永远消失了

translation.en: [producer] You think if she had hugged her, things would've turned out differently?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得如果她当时拥抱了女儿
‎事情的结果可能会不一样吗？

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我认为是这样

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: ‎我确实这样认为

translation.en: [Jack] That day we were supposed to go to a neighbor's for a, uh, birthday party,
translation.zh:
‎那天我们要去一个邻居家
‎举办的生日派对

translation.en: a kids' birthday party.
translation.zh: ‎一个孩子的生日派对

translation.en: She goes, "Let me get up and wrap the present."
translation.zh: ‎她说“让我起来把这个礼物包好”

translation.en: "I'm not gonna go."
translation.zh: ‎“我不去”

translation.en: "I'm gonna sleep. I got a migraine headache." [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎“我要睡觉 我偏头痛”

translation.en: Kyle and I went to that party.
translation.zh: ‎凯尔和我去了派对

translation.en: And when we came home,
translation.zh: ‎我们回家的时候

translation.en: her bedroom door was shut.
translation.zh: ‎卧室门关着

translation.en: We thought she was asleep.
translation.zh: ‎我们以为她在睡觉

translation.en: So we decided to sit down, watch some TV.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们决定坐下来看会儿电视

translation.en: Later that night,
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上晚些时候

translation.en: somebody was knocking on the door.
translation.zh: ‎有人敲门

translation.en: It was her brother, Peter.
translation.zh: ‎是她哥哥彼得

translation.en: So Peter was walking around the house.
translation.zh: ‎于是彼得在家里走动

translation.en: He walked in the garage.
translation.zh: ‎走进了车库

translation.en: There was a scream…
translation.zh: ‎那声尖叫…

translation.en: that I'll never forget.
translation.zh: ‎我永远都无法忘掉

translation.en: It's my name in Polish.
translation.zh: ‎用波兰语叫我的名字

translation.en: Jacek.
translation.zh: ‎杰克

translation.en: He screamed that so loud, I knew.
translation.zh: ‎他叫得那么大声 我就知道了

translation.en: [dispatch] 911, tell me exactly what happened.
translation.zh: ‎报警电话 详细告诉我发生了什么

translation.en: Uh, she hung herself in the garage.
translation.zh: ‎她在车库上吊自杀了

translation.en: -[Kyle] Mommy! No… -[Jack sighs] No--
translation.zh: ‎妈妈！

translation.en: -[dispatch] Stay on the line. -[Kyle crying]
translation.zh:
‎-不…
‎-不要挂断电话

translation.en: -[Jack sobs] -[dispatch] How old is she?
translation.zh: ‎她的年龄？

translation.en: [Jack] Forty-two.
translation.zh: ‎四十二

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: ‎天啊

translation.en: -[Kyle] Mommy! Mom! -[Jack] No, you can't go in there.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈！
‎-不行 你不能进去

translation.en: [dispatch] I'm sending someone to assist you. Please leave everything as you found it.
translation.zh:
‎我派人过去帮你
‎请保持现场原状不要动

translation.en: -[Jack] Just please get somebody here. -[dispatch] They're on their way.
translation.zh: ‎好 请你一定要派人过来 ‎他们已经出发了

translation.en: [man] Did your wife give you any indication that this would happen?
translation.zh:
‎你妻子是否有给过你任何暗示
‎会发生这种事？

translation.en: [Jack] No, but my daughter has an illness, and it's all started from that.
translation.zh:
‎没有 但我女儿生病了
‎都是从那时候开始的
