translation.en: -Just the disease alone was horrible. -[phone rings]
translation.zh: ‎那种疾病本身就很可怕了

translation.en: -This is my attorney. Could I answer it? -[man] Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我的律师 我可以接吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: -Hey, Debra. -[faintly] Oh my God!
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 德布拉
‎-天啊！

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -[Jack] Debra, I am so sick.
translation.zh:
‎-我很遗憾
‎-德布拉 我好难受

translation.en: -[Salisbury] I'm so sorry. -[Jack sobs]
translation.zh: ‎我很遗憾

translation.en: [Salisbury] I feel so bad. The judge was so cold.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉很糟糕 法官太冷漠了

translation.en: [Jack] I know this is what happened.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 事情就是这样发生的

translation.en: This… I know it's because he turned her down.
translation.zh: ‎我知道是因为他拒绝了她

translation.en: That killed her.
translation.zh: ‎那件事情害死了她

translation.en: All the way home, that's all she talked about.
translation.zh: ‎回家的路上 她一直在说这件事

translation.en: I don't know how I'm gonna tell Maya later.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道之后要怎么告诉玛雅

translation.en: Because I can't go there and tell her and then leave.
translation.zh:
‎因为我不能进去告诉她这件事
‎然后就离开

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Thanks, Deb. Bye.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 德布 再见

translation.en: [Salisbury] I remember the phone call from Jack that his wife had ended her life.
translation.zh:
‎我记得杰克给我打电话
‎说他的妻子自杀了

translation.en: I was devastated.
translation.zh: ‎我很受打击

translation.en: I just could not believe what had happened.
translation.zh: ‎我都不敢相信发生的事情

translation.en: But I think the note that Beata left for Judge Haworth
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得贝亚特给哈沃斯法官的留言

translation.en: makes it pretty clear
translation.zh: ‎说得很清楚

translation.en: that she wanted her child to be free from that hospital.
translation.zh: ‎她想让自己的孩子从医院里放出来

translation.en: She was very worried about what was happening
translation.zh: ‎她很担心女儿被迫接受的治疗中

translation.en: and the treatment that she was being forced to take.
translation.zh: ‎会发生什么

translation.en: She wanted to make sure that her child got out of there.
translation.zh: ‎她想确保她的孩子能从医院出来

translation.en: And she didn't see any other way out.
translation.zh: ‎她想不到其他的办法

translation.en: [Maya] Hi, Mommy!
translation.zh: ‎嗨 妈妈！

translation.en: [Beata] Hi, Maya.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 玛雅

translation.en: How is my sunshine today?
translation.zh: ‎我的小宝贝今天怎么样了？

translation.en: [Maya] I really, really miss you, Mommy.
translation.zh: ‎我真的、真的非常想你 妈妈

translation.en: [Beata] I do too.
translation.zh: ‎我也是

translation.en: I miss you every second of the day.
translation.zh: ‎我每分每秒都在想你

translation.en: [Maya] I miss you coming home from work.
translation.zh: ‎我想念你下班回家

translation.en: Hugging and snuggling.
translation.zh: ‎想跟你抱抱 想跟你依偎

translation.en: I miss swimming in the pool with you.
translation.zh: ‎我想念跟你在泳池里游泳

translation.en: I miss everything.
translation.zh: ‎我想念一切

translation.en: [Beata] Just close your eyes and pretend I'm there.
translation.zh: ‎闭上眼睛 假装我在你身边

translation.en: I know it's not the same, but just be strong and don't lose hope.
translation.zh:
‎我知道感觉不一样
‎但是要坚强 不要失去希望

translation.en: [Maya] I'm hurting. I wanna come home.
translation.zh: ‎我很痛 我想回家

translation.en: [Beata] I will do everything. I promise you.
translation.zh: ‎我会不惜一切 我向你保证

translation.en: [Jack] Shortly after Beata's death,
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特死后不久

translation.en: they allowed me to take Maya
translation.zh: ‎他们就允许我带玛雅

translation.en: to go see a specialist in Rhode Island.
translation.zh: ‎去看罗德岛的一个专家

translation.en: Dr. Chopra.
translation.zh: ‎乔普拉医生

translation.en: He did an evaluation on her,
translation.zh: ‎医生对她进行了评估

translation.en: which did confirm that she does have CRPS.
translation.zh: ‎确认她患了复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: And he sent his report to the court.
translation.zh: ‎他把报告发给了法院

translation.en: Not too much longer after that, Maya was released to my custody.
translation.zh:
‎之后不久 玛雅就被释放
‎交给我监护了

translation.en: [woman] Maya, we are so excited to see you.
translation.zh:
‎（进入州监护92天
‎2017年1月13日） ‎玛雅 我们很高兴见到你

translation.en: So thankful you're home.
translation.zh: ‎对你回家充满感激

translation.en: [Beata] Would you like to pray together?
translation.zh: ‎你想一起祈祷吗？

translation.en: [Maya] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Beata] Lord Jesus, I now take your precious blood
translation.zh: ‎我主耶稣 我现在用你珍贵的血液

translation.en: and sprinkle it over Maya and my family.
translation.zh: ‎洒在玛雅和我的家人身上

translation.en: I surrender my family to you.
translation.zh: ‎我把家人交给你

translation.en: Take care of everything, and take care of Maya.
translation.zh: ‎照顾好一切 好好照顾玛雅

translation.en: [Maya] Amen.
translation.zh: ‎阿门

translation.en: [Maya] My mom was very compassionate.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈很有同情心

translation.en: She was caring, loyal, intelligent.
translation.zh: ‎她很有爱心、忠诚、聪明

translation.en: It's hard to, you know, pick adjectives
translation.zh: ‎很难去挑选形容词

translation.en: because, honestly, when I think of my mom, there's…
translation.zh: ‎因为说实话 当我想到妈妈

translation.en: You can't really describe her in a couple of words.
translation.zh: ‎真的无法用简单几个词汇去描述

translation.en: After being held captive for three whole months,
translation.zh: ‎在被关押整整三个月后

translation.en: being told that I could go back to some normalcy,
translation.zh: ‎被告知我可以恢复正常状态

translation.en: it was so nice to hear that.
translation.zh: ‎听到这句话真是太好了

translation.en: It felt like all of my prayers had been answered,
translation.zh: ‎我感觉我所有的祷告都得到了回应

translation.en: all of my family's prayers had been answered.
translation.zh: ‎我家人所有的祷告都得到了回应

translation.en: But I lost one of the most important people in my life.
translation.zh: ‎但我失去了人生中最重要的一个人

translation.en: A person who I didn't even get to say goodbye to.
translation.zh: ‎一个我都没机会道别的人

translation.en: Yeah, that was the worst.
translation.zh: ‎对 那是最糟糕的

translation.en: Here I thought I was gonna be able to see her again,
translation.zh: ‎我以为我还能再见到她

translation.en: maybe even if it took an entire year.
translation.zh: ‎可能需要一整年

translation.en: But just being told that that was never gonna happen…
translation.zh:
‎但别人告诉我
‎我永远都见不到她了

translation.en: [producer] Let's take a break now, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们先休息一下 好吗？

translation.en: -Let me get you some water, okay? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我给你拿点水 好吗？

translation.en: [Jack] After Maya was released in 2017,
translation.zh: ‎玛雅2017年被释放后

translation.en: we had to follow certain instructions from the court.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须遵守法庭的特定规定

translation.en: She was not allowed any ketamine treatments,
translation.zh: ‎她不被允许任何氯胺酮治疗

translation.en: so we had to do things slow.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们必须慢慢来

translation.en: It took over a year of physical therapy,
translation.zh: ‎物理治疗花了一年多的时间

translation.en: and she went from a wheelchair to crutches.
translation.zh: ‎她从坐轮椅改成了拄拐杖

translation.en: And then one year after that, walking around.
translation.zh: ‎又过了一年 可以自己走了

translation.en: But she still had pain.
translation.zh: ‎但她还是很痛

translation.en: A lot of pain.
translation.zh: ‎非常痛苦

translation.en: And she could relapse any time.
translation.zh: ‎她随时都有可能会复发

translation.en: [director] So, Maya can walk now.
translation.zh: ‎所以玛雅现在可以走路了

translation.en: Yes, Maya can walk now.
translation.zh: ‎对 玛雅现在可以走路了

translation.en: She has… She still has some impairments in her lower extremities.
translation.zh: ‎她的下肢还有些损伤

translation.en: [on tape] …stand up. Thatta girl.
translation.zh: ‎…站起来 好姑娘

translation.en: -Good job! -She's made tremendous gains.
translation.zh: ‎她取得了巨大的进步

translation.en: But she has CRPS,
translation.zh: ‎但她得了复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: and she's gonna continue to have to live with that diagnosis.
translation.zh: ‎她会继续带着这个诊断生活

translation.en: [Jack] We are trying to do the best we can.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经在尽力了

translation.en: But the kids will never be the same.
translation.zh: ‎但孩子们永远不可能回到之前了

translation.en: It's very difficult to understand what went through Beata's mind.
translation.zh: ‎很难理解贝亚特思想中经历了什么

translation.en: Thinking that was the only way to get her daughter out.
translation.zh: ‎认为那是唯一能让女儿出来的办法

translation.en: I miss her dearly.
translation.zh: ‎我非常想念她

translation.en: But… I have anger, here and there.
translation.zh: ‎但我充满了愤怒

translation.en: It is so difficult to try to play both roles.
translation.zh:
‎同时扮演父母两个角色
‎真的太难了

translation.en: And as much as you try, you cannot replace their mother.
translation.zh:
‎虽然你可以努力尝试
‎但永远无法替代他们的母亲

translation.en: Something good has to come from all this pain.
translation.zh:
‎在这些痛苦中
‎必须要创造一些好的结果

translation.en: [woman] I've been a reporter for over five years,
translation.zh: ‎我做记者超过五年了

translation.en: and, you know, you don't get to the truth
translation.zh:
‎如果你只是接受眼前的情况
‎不去质疑

translation.en: by just accepting what's in front of you without questioning it.
translation.zh: ‎永远无法获得真相

translation.en: And this seemed like an area that needed to be questioned.
translation.zh: ‎这个领域似乎需要去质疑

translation.en: In 2019, I was covering child welfare in Sarasota
translation.zh:
‎2019年 我在萨拉索塔
‎报道儿童福利事件

translation.en: when I came across the case of the Kowalski family.
translation.zh:
‎这个时候我遇到了
‎考尔斯基一家的事情

translation.en: It just was so tragic, so complicated.
translation.zh: ‎他们的事情太悲痛了 太复杂了

translation.en: And when I learned that Beata Kowalski had actually taken her life,
translation.zh: ‎当我了解到贝亚特·考尔斯基自杀了

translation.en: I mean, it just hit me like a wall of bricks.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉天崩地裂

translation.en: I knew that I had to take the story on, and I knew that I had to get it right.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我必须报道出这个故事
‎我知道我必须做好

translation.en: So I started digging.
translation.zh: ‎于是我开始挖掘信息

translation.en: Part of my investigation was talking to the Kowalskis.
translation.zh:
‎我调查的一部分
‎就是跟考尔斯基一家聊

translation.en: I also interviewed Dr. Sally Smith over the phone
translation.zh:
‎我也在电话中
‎采访了莎莉·史密斯医生

translation.en: to get her side of the story,
translation.zh: ‎听听她那个角度的陈述

translation.en: and Dr. Smith was extremely firm that she had done nothing wrong.
translation.zh:
‎史密斯医生极其肯定
‎她没有做错任何事

translation.en: But what I found out was that Dr. Smith's opinions
translation.zh: ‎但我发现史密斯医生的观点

translation.en: differed a lot from other doctors, including Maya's care team,
translation.zh:
‎跟其他医生有很大的不同
‎包括照顾玛雅的团队

translation.en: Doctor Kirkpatrick and Dr. Hanna.
translation.zh: ‎柯帕里克医生和汉纳医生

translation.en: It was January 2019 when I hit publish on that piece about the Kowalski family,
translation.zh:
‎我在2019年一月发表了
‎考尔斯基一家的新闻

translation.en: and I kind of thought I'd move on to the next thing.
translation.zh: ‎以为我接下来就会去关注其他事情了

translation.en: But that was when the calls started coming in
translation.zh: ‎但那个时候 不断有电话打来

translation.en: and the emails started coming in,
translation.zh: ‎不断有邮件发过来

translation.en: and I realized that this was a lot bigger than just the Kowalskis.
translation.zh:
‎我意识到这种事情
‎远远不止发生在考尔斯基一家

translation.en: -Rolling. Take Care of Maya…
translation.zh: ‎正在拍摄 《好好照顾玛雅》…

translation.en: -Ashley interview, take two. -Take Care of Maya…
translation.zh:
‎-阿什利的采访 第二条
‎-《好好照顾玛雅》…

translation.en: Vivianna, take one.
translation.zh: ‎薇薇安娜 第一条

translation.en: When I read the article in the Sarasota Herald Tribune,
translation.zh:
‎我读到《萨拉索塔先驱论坛报》
‎这篇报道的时候

translation.en: I realized it was so much bigger than what we had thought.
translation.zh: ‎我发现这比我们当初预想要深远很多

translation.en: Bye. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: ‎再见

translation.en: The realization that there are so many other people going through it…
translation.zh: ‎意识到还有很多人经历这种事…

translation.en: I couldn't believe it. I could not believe it.
translation.zh: ‎我真的不敢相信 难以置信

translation.en: He's having a seizure. His eyes are rolling. He's shaking.
translation.zh: ‎他癫痫发作 翻白眼 颤抖

translation.en: He's not breathing. He barely has a pulse.
translation.zh: ‎无法呼吸 几乎都没有脉搏了

translation.en: She started throwing up.
translation.zh: ‎她开始狂吐

translation.en: Then she started getting little bruises.
translation.zh: ‎然后她身上开始有小的淤青

translation.en: I'm rushing to the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎我冲到了医院

translation.en: -We need to call 911. -Call 911.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要打报警电话
‎-打报警电话

translation.en: We instantly called 911. We did what you're taught to do.
translation.zh:
‎我们立刻打了报警电话
‎我们按照你教的方式做了

translation.en: [Chen] I'm sitting at my desk,
translation.zh: ‎我坐在桌旁

translation.en: and I start hearing from more and more families.
translation.zh: ‎开始听到越来越多家庭的故事

translation.en: People who had gone to the doctor for help for their kids
translation.zh: ‎那些带着孩子去寻求医生帮助的人

translation.en: and then became the target of the system.
translation.zh: ‎最后变成了这个体系攻击的靶子

translation.en: They find broken ribs. They find a brain bleed.
translation.zh:
‎他们发现了肋骨骨折
‎发现了大脑出血

translation.en: They found old and new brain bleeds.
translation.zh: ‎他们发现了大脑有陈旧的和新的出血

translation.en: And I was like, "What do you mean, like, she has this?"
translation.zh: ‎我说“什么意思？她本来就这样”

translation.en: "I brought her here for bruises."
translation.zh: ‎“我就是因为淤青带她来看病的”

translation.en: And that's when I met Sally Smith.
translation.zh:
‎我就是在这个时候
‎遇见了莎莉·史密斯

translation.en: [Chen] They're frantic. They're desperate.
translation.zh: ‎他们很疯狂 他们很绝望

translation.en: And one thing that they all had in common was Dr. Sally Smith
translation.zh:
‎他们都有的一个共同点 ‎就是莎莉·史密斯医生
‎和约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院

translation.en: and Johns Hopkins All Children's Hospital.
translation.zh:
‎就是莎莉·史密斯医生
‎和约翰·霍普金斯儿童医院

translation.en: [Vivianna] She saw us for less than ten minutes,
translation.zh: ‎她看了我们不到十分钟

translation.en: and then my husband was arrested for aggravated child abuse.
translation.zh:
‎然后我丈夫
‎就因为严重虐待儿童被捕了

translation.en: We ended up arrested and imprisoned, and my children were in foster care.
translation.zh:
‎我们最后被逮捕 被监禁
‎我孩子进入了寄养家庭

translation.en: [Chen] These families walked in, hoping for help for their child,
translation.zh:
‎这些家庭走进医院
‎希望给他们的孩子寻求帮助

translation.en: and some of them walked out in handcuffs.
translation.zh:
‎有些人走出医院的时候
‎自己戴上了手铐

translation.en: [Maya] At the hospital,
translation.zh: ‎在医院…

translation.en: the way they spoke about my mom,
translation.zh: ‎他们谈论我母亲的方式

translation.en: it was pretty messed up.
translation.zh: ‎真的很糟糕

translation.en: They would try to convince me that my mom was doing things to me.
translation.zh:
‎他们会试着说服我
‎我妈妈对我做了什么

translation.en: That she was making my CRPS up.
translation.zh:
‎我的复杂性区域疼痛综合征
‎是她编造的

translation.en: It's complete nonsense.
translation.zh: ‎全是胡说八道

translation.en: I realize that now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在才知道

translation.en: At first, I was, um… definitely confused,
translation.zh: ‎最开始 我当然很困惑

translation.en: and that confusion molded into anger.
translation.zh: ‎那种困惑变成了愤怒

translation.en: To be in a hospital that's basically keeping you captive
translation.zh: ‎可以说是把你监禁在一个医院里

translation.en: away from my family, my friends, my school,
translation.zh: ‎远离家人、朋友、学校

translation.en: and away from the person you love.
translation.zh: ‎远离你爱的人们

translation.en: Just very frustrating.
translation.zh: ‎非常让人沮丧

translation.en: But I kept it in.
translation.zh: ‎但我一直坚持着

translation.en: 'Cause I was raised by two parents
translation.zh: ‎因为我的父母

translation.en: who always taught me to be kind and respectful,
translation.zh: ‎一直教会我善良 尊重别人

translation.en: and that's what I did.
translation.zh: ‎我也是这样做的

translation.en: [Jack] You know what?
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？

translation.en: We tried to cooperate.
translation.zh: ‎我们试着配合

translation.en: But nothing changes if you stay quiet.
translation.zh: ‎但你保持沉默 也没有任何改变

translation.en: And we have to hold Johns Hopkins responsible for what they done.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须让约翰·霍普金斯
‎为他们做的事情付出代价

translation.en: We want justice for Mom.
translation.zh: ‎我们想为妈妈伸张正义

translation.en: [Beata] Okay, so the first one was Namenda.
translation.zh: ‎好 所以第一个是美金刚胺

translation.en: -And the second one was… -[nurse] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎第二个是…

translation.en: [Beata] He left you a message, and I know he did. -And then he sent you email later. -[nurse] All right, Beata--
translation.zh:
‎他给你留了一条信息 我知道他留了
‎后来他还给你发了邮件

translation.en: [Beata] The judge allowed her to have a phone.
translation.zh:
‎-好 贝亚特
‎-法官允许她用手机

translation.en: -It's in the court order. -[nurse] Beata. Please stop recording me.
translation.zh:
‎-这是法院的命令
‎-贝亚特 请你不要录我了

translation.en: [man] Beata was a nurse, not a lawyer.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特是护士 不是律师

translation.en: But somehow, she knew what the hospital was doing.
translation.zh: ‎但她知道医院在做什么

translation.en: She documented everything.
translation.zh: ‎她记录下了一切

translation.en: Every email, every writing, every phone call,
translation.zh:
‎每一封邮件 每一次纸条
‎每一通电话

translation.en: and all of that documentation is the reason we can sue.
translation.zh: ‎这些记录都是我们可以起诉的理由

translation.en: Because when they come in and tell us a falsehood,
translation.zh: ‎因为他们插进来告诉我们一个谎言

translation.en: we have the truth.
translation.zh: ‎我们拥有真相

translation.en: [woman] When I heard those phone calls, as a mother, I got it.
translation.zh: ‎我听到那些电话 作为一个母亲 我懂

translation.en: I got the frustration of Beata.
translation.zh: ‎我能理解贝亚特的绝望

translation.en: It was like a pressure cooker. You know?
translation.zh: ‎就像压力锅一样

translation.en: I… I could feel that just kind of building up.
translation.zh: ‎我能感觉到压力在逐渐累积

translation.en: As lawyers, we're trained to separate the emotion out of it,
translation.zh:
‎作为律师 我们接受过训练
‎在案件中分离自己的情绪

translation.en: but you can't help yourself.
translation.zh: ‎但你无法控制自己

translation.en: You think about "What if it was my child,
translation.zh: ‎你会想 如果这是我的孩子 会怎么样

translation.en: and she's got something that's causing extreme pain,
translation.zh: ‎她身上有病 会导致异常的疼痛

translation.en: and then you find doctors that say there's hope?"
translation.zh: ‎然后你找到了说有希望的医生

translation.en: That was all just stripped away instantly.
translation.zh: ‎那一瞬间 这些全都被夺走了

translation.en: Most families give up.
translation.zh: ‎多数家庭会放弃

translation.en: Not because they want to,
translation.zh: ‎不是因为他们想放弃

translation.en: but because they're taking on a huge corporation and the state.
translation.zh:
‎而是因为他们面对的
‎是大的法人团体和整个州

translation.en: So most parents don't have the ability, the funds, the fortitude, or the counsel
translation.zh:
‎所以多数父母没有能力
‎没有资金 没有毅力 也没有法律顾问

translation.en: to fight back, so they enter into a case plan.
translation.zh:
‎去回击 所以他们只能认同
‎法院给出的监护计划

translation.en: My attorney advised that it'd be safest and quickest to take the case plan.
translation.zh:
‎我的律师建议 进入监护计划
‎是最安全、最快的方式

translation.en: [Jennifer] A case plan is where a parent chooses to go along
translation.zh: ‎监护计划是父母选择遵从

translation.en: with whatever the state requires of them.
translation.zh: ‎州要求他们做的任何事

translation.en: A checklist, if you will, to get your child back.
translation.zh: ‎可以说是一个清单 把孩子弄回来

translation.en: It's just simpler to go through the case plan
translation.zh: ‎进入监护计划会简单很多

translation.en: even if you're innocent.
translation.zh: ‎就算你并没有做错

translation.en: However, if you go ahead and sign the case plan,
translation.zh: ‎然而 如果你同意 签署了监护计划

translation.en: you're releasing the hospital from liability.
translation.zh: ‎就让医院没有了责任

translation.en: But the Kowalskis didn't take a case plan.
translation.zh: ‎但考尔斯基一家没有接受监护计划

translation.en: Beata wasn't gonna do that.
translation.zh: ‎贝亚特不会同意

translation.en: She knew she was right, and she was gonna fight.
translation.zh: ‎她知道自己是对的 她想奋战到底

translation.en: [Jennifer] I don't know that they were looking to the future,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他们在考虑很远的未来

translation.en: but I do know that set them apart.
translation.zh: ‎但我知道那样会让他们分开

translation.en: If she hadn't taken such an aggressive approach, we couldn't have sued.
translation.zh: ‎如果她没有采取这么激进的策略 ‎我们就无法起诉

translation.en: So we're going after the hospital,
translation.zh: ‎所以我们要追究医院的责任

translation.en: Dr. Sally Smith, and Suncoast,
translation.zh: ‎莎莉·史密斯医生和阳光海岸的责任

translation.en: based on what's known as "infliction of emotional distress,"
translation.zh: ‎基于“精神损失犯罪”

translation.en: meaning that they knew what they were doing,
translation.zh: ‎意味着他们知道自己在做什么

translation.en: pushing her towards some form of harm.
translation.zh: ‎把她推向某种伤害

translation.en: So they should pay punitive damages,
translation.zh: ‎所以他们应该付出惩罚行赔偿

translation.en: which are designed to punish them for their wrongdoing.
translation.zh:
‎目的就是因为他们做错的事情
‎惩罚他们

translation.en: [Vivianna] This young girl, Maya, represents hope for all of us
translation.zh:
‎这个小女孩玛雅
‎代表着我们所有人的希望

translation.en: in bringing Sally Smith down, bringing the system down.
translation.zh: ‎扳倒莎莉·史密斯 扳倒整个体系

translation.en: [Jennifer] They want their voice heard, they want to be able to tell their story,
translation.zh: ‎他们想让自己的声音被听到 ‎他们希望能讲述自己的故事

translation.en: and they want the hospital and Dr. Sally Smith to actually hear them.
translation.zh:
‎他们希望医院
‎和莎莉·史密斯医生听他们的声音

translation.en: [Maya] I want people to see that I wasn't lying,
translation.zh: ‎我想让别人知道 我没有说谎

translation.en: and that other families who are going through similar situations,
translation.zh: ‎其他经历相似状况的家庭

translation.en: they're not lying either.
translation.zh: ‎也没有说谎

translation.en: I have CRPS.
translation.zh: ‎我得了复杂性区域疼痛综合征

translation.en: My mom was not making me sick.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈没有伪造我的病

translation.en: I just wish people would believe me.
translation.zh: ‎我只是希望人们能相信我

translation.en: [bailiff] Miss Kowalski, would you be so kind as to raise your right hand?
translation.zh: ‎考尔斯基小姐 你可以抬起右手吗？

translation.en: Do you solemnly swear the testimony you are about to give
translation.zh: ‎你是否严肃地发誓 即将给出的证词

translation.en: will be the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh: ‎完全是真实的 没有半点虚假？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎是

translation.en: [lawyer 1] We're on the record. The time is 9:57 on August 28, 2020.
translation.zh: ‎我们开始录制 ‎时间是2020年8月28日9:57

translation.en: [court clerk] This marks the beginning of the deposition of Kyle Kowalski.
translation.zh: ‎这标志着凯尔·考尔斯基的证词开始

translation.en: We are on the record. October 15th, 2021, at 9:01 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在录制 2021年10月15日9:01

translation.en: [Jack] It's been five years now since we decided to file a lawsuit against Johns Hopkins.
translation.zh:
‎我们决定起诉约翰·霍普金斯
‎到现在已经五年了

translation.en: We're not sleeping at night. We're thinking of it all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我们晚上都睡不着 总是想这件事

translation.en: [lawyer 1] Time is 2:41. We're going off the record.
translation.zh: ‎时间是2:41 我们要停止拍摄了

translation.en: It's absolutely brutal.
translation.zh: ‎太残忍了

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Did you look for a second opinion
translation.zh: ‎你们当时有没有寻求其他人的意见

translation.en: for someone who could perform a ketamine coma procedure?
translation.zh: ‎可以施行氯胺酮昏迷治疗的人？

translation.en: That, I'm unaware of.
translation.zh: ‎我不清楚

translation.en: Unfortunately, the person that would know that answer is dead.
translation.zh: ‎很不幸 清楚这件事的人已经死了

translation.en: [lawyer 2] By that, you mean your late wife, Beata Kowalski?
translation.zh:
‎你是说你已故的妻子
‎贝亚特·考尔斯基？

translation.en: That is correct.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: [lawyer 2] You indicate in paragraph six of your affidavit that you, quote,
translation.zh: ‎你在第六段中表明你的誓言 原话是

translation.en: "refuse to go to doctors or hospitals."
translation.zh: ‎“拒绝去看医生或者去医院”

translation.en: -Do you see that? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-看到了吗？
‎-是

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Why is it that you refuse to go to doctors or hospitals?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么拒绝去看医生或者去医院？

translation.en: I feel like it's pretty self-explanatory.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉已经不需要解释 很清楚了

translation.en: The last time I was in a hospital,
translation.zh: ‎我上一次去医院的时候

translation.en: I was medically abducted for three months.
translation.zh: ‎被医疗绑架了三个月

translation.en: I just can't go to doctors. I hate going to doctors.
translation.zh: ‎我没办法去看医生 我讨厌看医生

translation.en: I hate going to hospitals.
translation.zh: ‎我也讨厌去医院

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Next time you do a depo on my daughter, could you use a different tactic?
translation.zh:
‎你下次给我女儿拍摄证词的时候
‎是否可以换一个策略？

translation.en: She takes it hard, and you gotta be careful.
translation.zh:
‎她觉得这种方式很难受
‎你们要注意一些

translation.en: -Especially with a young child. -[lawyer 2] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是对一个小孩子

translation.en: [crying] I remember
translation.zh: ‎我记得

translation.en: hearing the nurses talk about me.
translation.zh: ‎听到护士们聊起我

translation.en: "She's a liar. She's a liar. Don't believe anything she said."
translation.zh:
‎“她是个骗子
‎不要相信她说的任何话”

translation.en: "She's not in pain." That's what they would say to me.
translation.zh: ‎“她并不痛” 他们会对我这样说

translation.en: That's what they would say to people!
translation.zh: ‎他们也这样对别人说！

translation.en: You have no clue how traumatic that was for me.
translation.zh:
‎你们根本不知道
‎这对我造成了多大的伤害

translation.en: You have the audacity to ask me why I'm afraid of hospitals?
translation.zh: ‎你居然有胆量问我为什么害怕医院？

translation.en: Are you insane? Are you insane?
translation.zh: ‎你疯了吗？

translation.en: My mom died, and I will never get to see her again!
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈死了
‎我永远都无法再见到她了！

translation.en: Ever!
translation.zh: ‎永远都不可能了！

translation.en: I have to go to school, and girls talk about
translation.zh: ‎我必须去学校 女孩子们会谈论

translation.en: how they went on shopping trips with their mom.
translation.zh: ‎他们跟妈妈出去购物

translation.en: How they get to, you know, have little things.
translation.zh: ‎在一起相处的小事情

translation.en: You know how hard it is for me to sit and, like, listen to that?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我坐在那里听那些
‎有多难受吗？

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: ‎你是认真问我的吗？

translation.en: You traumatized me!
translation.zh: ‎你让我产生了阴影！

translation.en: [lawyer 2] You need to take a break, Maya? -[frustratedly] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你要休息一下吗 玛雅？
‎-要

translation.en: [lawyer 2] Okay. We can go off the record.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们可以停止录像

translation.en: [Gregory] We're in the final stages of preparations to get us to trial.
translation.zh:
‎我们已经在进行庭审
‎准备的最后阶段了

translation.en: So people are staying up late.
translation.zh: ‎所以大家都在熬夜加班

translation.en: There's paper flying everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎到处都是纸

translation.en: We're getting last-minute motions filed. We're flying experts in.
translation.zh:
‎我们还在不断临时添加动议
‎有专家飞过来

translation.en: They all come down to see Dr. Hanna and get ketamine treatments?
translation.zh:
‎他们都跑来找汉纳医生
‎进行氯胺酮治疗？

translation.en: [Gregory] And recently, we started digging into the codes
translation.zh: ‎最近我们开始调查

translation.en: that Johns Hopkins used for billing the insurance companies,
translation.zh:
‎约翰·霍普金斯给保险公司
‎计费账单的编码

translation.en: and we found out that they billed them for three months' treatment for CRPS.
translation.zh:
‎我们发现他们给保险公司开账单
‎进行三个月复杂性区域疼痛的治疗

translation.en: The exact same illness
translation.zh: ‎就是这个莎莉·史密斯

translation.en: Sally Smith was telling the courts she did not have
translation.zh: ‎告诉法院玛雅并没有得的病

translation.en: and that the parents had made up.
translation.zh: ‎说是父母捏造的

translation.en: I think the other side's gonna have a hard time.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得另一方会很不好受

translation.en: I think that's why they have been fighting tooth and nail
translation.zh:
‎我觉得这就是为什么
‎他们一直拼命抗拒

translation.en: to play keep away from the jury.
translation.zh: ‎想要远离陪审团

translation.en: And we just found out that the hospital hired a former judge
translation.zh: ‎我们刚发现医院雇了一个第二区域

translation.en: from the Second District Court of Appeals that sits above our trial court,
translation.zh:
‎上诉法院的前任法官
‎是我们案件审理法院的上级

translation.en: so Johns Hopkins will have incredibly powerful legal representation.
translation.zh:
‎这样约翰·霍普金斯就会拥有
‎非常大的法律代表力量

translation.en: [Gregory] April 4th, we pick a jury,
translation.zh: ‎4月4日 我们选择一个陪审团

translation.en: and then we'll be in trial.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们就开始审理

translation.en: -[computer chimes] -[Gregory] Hi, May.
translation.zh:
‎（2022年4月1日
‎选择陪审团三天前） ‎嗨 玛雅

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Gregory] Where's Kyle?
translation.zh: ‎凯尔在哪里？

translation.en: -There he is. -Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-他在那里
‎-你好

translation.en: -How's my man? -Good.
translation.zh:
‎-我的男人怎么样了？
‎-很好

translation.en: So, yesterday morning,
translation.zh: ‎所以昨天早上

translation.en: we got an order telling us we could go to trial.
translation.zh:
‎我们接到指令
‎说我们可以进行审理了

translation.en: And we were ecstatic.
translation.zh: ‎我们欣喜若狂

translation.en: Then, around 1:30,
translation.zh: ‎然后大约在1:30

translation.en: we get the second order from the Second District Court of Appeals
translation.zh:
‎我们接到了第二区域上诉法院的
‎第二个指令

translation.en: to stay the trial.
translation.zh: ‎停止审理

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: ‎所以

translation.en: we're not gonna go to trial Monday.
translation.zh: ‎我们周一不会进行庭审了

translation.en: Are you gonna be okay, May?
translation.zh: ‎你会没事吧 玛雅？

translation.en: -I guess. -We're gonna get 'em.
translation.zh:
‎-应该吧
‎-我们一定会扳倒他们

translation.en: -[scoffs] But-- -We got 'em.
translation.zh:
‎-但是…
‎-我们可以

translation.en: -It's just a… -[Gregory] Hey. -…little more time. -[Gregory] Maya.
translation.zh: ‎只是需要多一点时间

translation.en: That's what we've been told for how many years?
translation.zh: ‎我们这种话听多少年了？

translation.en: -Maya, listen. -I can tell you this.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 听我说 ‎我可以这样告诉你

translation.en: They don't have a case at trial
translation.zh: ‎他们现在没有立案

translation.en: because they're fighting so hard to keep us out of the courtroom.
translation.zh:
‎是因为他们非常努力反抗
‎不想让我们进入法庭

translation.en: The last thing they want on the planet
translation.zh: ‎他们最不想发生的事情就是

translation.en: is seeing the three Kowalskis on that witness stand telling their story.
translation.zh:
‎看到考尔斯基一家三个人
‎在证人席上讲述他们的故事

translation.en: It's perseverance that wins the day here.
translation.zh: ‎坚持不懈才会胜利

translation.en: [Kyle] They're scared for us being in the courtroom.
translation.zh: ‎他们害怕案件进入法庭

translation.en: They're just doing everything they could to keep us out and keep delaying it.
translation.zh:
‎他们在不惜一切阻止我们上法庭
‎不断推迟

translation.en: I just don't want us as a family to feel defeated.
translation.zh: ‎我们作为一家人 不想感觉被击败

translation.en: Losing my mom,
translation.zh: ‎失去我妈妈

translation.en: and then all the stress that's put on my dad,
translation.zh: ‎然后所有压力放到爸爸身上

translation.en: trying to manage having kids, and then going through all this.
translation.zh:
‎试着管理好两个孩子
‎还要经历这一切

translation.en: I just don't want us to live the rest of our lives knowing that.
translation.zh:
‎我不想让我们余生的日子
‎都这样去想

translation.en: [director] Knowing what?
translation.zh: ‎怎样去想？

translation.en: That we lost.
translation.zh: ‎想我们失败了

translation.en: [Chen] Even when cases had been dropped or overturned, the damage had been done.
translation.zh:
‎就算案件被撤销或者推翻
‎伤害也已经造成了

translation.en: Kids had been traumatized,
translation.zh: ‎对孩子的伤害已经造成了

translation.en: parents had their reputations destroyed.
translation.zh: ‎父母的名誉也损坏了

translation.en: [Ashley] Even though my charges were dropped, and I was found of no wrongdoing,
translation.zh:
‎虽然对我的指控取消了
‎我没有被判做错任何事

translation.en: I had people messaging me, telling me that I should kill myself,
translation.zh:
‎还是有人给我发消息
‎说我应该自杀

translation.en: that my children deserved to be in foster care,
translation.zh: ‎说我的孩子活该去寄养家庭

translation.en: and they hoped I never got them back.
translation.zh: ‎说他们希望我永远无法要回孩子

translation.en: [Carly] They tried to divide her father and I.
translation.zh: ‎他们试着分开我和她爸爸

translation.en: They wanted us to argue. They wanted us to blame each other.
translation.zh:
‎他们想让我们争吵
‎想让我们互相怪罪

translation.en: I lost a lot of friends.
translation.zh: ‎我失去了很多朋友

translation.en: I lost my home, my job,
translation.zh: ‎我失去了家 失去了我的工作

translation.en: my daughter.
translation.zh: ‎我的女儿

translation.en: I've learned to try not to think about it because, you know, she's home now, and…
translation.zh:
‎我试着学会不要去想这件事
‎因为她现在已经回家了…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: Nobody ever pays you back
translation.zh: ‎没有人会还给你

translation.en: for the money that you spent on lawyers and experts and attorneys,
translation.zh: ‎你花在律师和专家上的钱

translation.en: and you go into debt. You know, we almost filed for bankruptcy.
translation.zh: ‎你会负债累累 我们就差宣布破产了

translation.en: It's just crazy.
translation.zh: ‎真的很疯狂

translation.en: [John] I spent over 300 days in jail before they finally dropped the charges.
translation.zh:
‎我在监狱坐牢了超过300天
‎他们才终于撤销了指控

translation.en: They ruined my life because of it.
translation.zh: ‎他们因为这件事毁掉了我的人生

translation.en: [Ashley] It's just a very scary feeling
translation.zh: ‎这种感觉非常恐怖

translation.en: to know that somebody's words can be so life changing.
translation.zh:
‎知道别人的片面之词
‎也能改变一个人的人生

translation.en: There's a lot of pressure on child-abuse pediatricians
translation.zh: ‎虐待儿童的儿科医生要面对很大压力

translation.en: to be able to say definitively
translation.zh: ‎才能够明确地说

translation.en: that this was abuse, or that this was an accident.
translation.zh: ‎这是虐待 或者发生了事故

translation.en: But these kinds of cases are way too complicated
translation.zh: ‎但这些案件太复杂了

translation.en: to be black and white.
translation.zh: ‎不只黑白分明的

translation.en: Often they're in a gray area.
translation.zh: ‎通常都是中间的灰色地带

translation.en: So when there is just one person whose word is like gold,
translation.zh:
‎所以如果只有一个人的话语
‎有着黄金的重量

translation.en: opinions, interpretation, perspectives, bias starts to play in
translation.zh:
‎观点、解读、看法、偏见
‎就会开始起作用

translation.en: and starts to play a huge, huge role, and it can be a dangerous one.
translation.zh:
‎开始扮演非常重大的角色
‎甚至可能很危险

translation.en: [Vivianna] Since 2016, I've been writing Sally Smith a Christmas card
translation.zh:
‎从2016年
‎我就一直给莎莉·史密斯写圣诞贺卡

translation.en: with our family's picture on it
translation.zh: ‎把我们家庭的照片放在上面

translation.en: so she's reminded of a family that she tried to break apart but didn't.
translation.zh:
‎提醒她 有一个她努力
‎破坏的家庭 但她没有成功

translation.en: She wrote me back one year, which I was very surprised,
translation.zh: ‎她有一年给我回复了 我很意外

translation.en: and this is what she said.
translation.zh: ‎她是这样说的

translation.en: "Dear Mr. and Mrs. Graham, I received your card again
translation.zh:
‎“亲爱的格拉哈姆先生和太太
‎我又收到了你们的卡片”

translation.en: and just wanted to say I'm sorry you're still so angry
translation.zh: ‎我只想说 很遗憾你们依然对

translation.en: about my part in the investigation regarding your son."
translation.zh:
‎调查你们儿子的事情中
‎我扮演的角色感到愤怒”

translation.en: "There are definitely a disturbing number
translation.zh: ‎“皮内拉斯县确实有着

translation.en: of abused and neglected children in Pinellas County."
translation.zh: ‎惊人数量的虐待和忽视儿童案件”

translation.en: "I understand you feel very strongly that your son wasn't one of them."
translation.zh:
‎“你强烈感觉你的儿子不是其中之一
‎我非常理解”

translation.en: "You mentioned in your note
translation.zh: ‎“你在留言中提到

translation.en: that Tristan was found to have another diagnosis,
translation.zh: ‎崔斯坦被发现有另一个诊断

translation.en: and if you have a chance,
translation.zh: ‎如果你有机会

translation.en: I would very much like to hear what that was
translation.zh: ‎我非常想听听那个诊断是什么

translation.en: so I can consider it appropriately next time."
translation.zh: ‎让我下次能够好好考虑”

translation.en: "I try very hard to be thorough and get it right."
translation.zh: ‎“我非常努力做到彻底 去做对”

translation.en: "But perhaps…"
translation.zh: ‎“但可能

translation.en: "…I need to be careful to consider the 'gray areas.'"
translation.zh: ‎我考虑‘灰色地带’需要更加小心

translation.en: If there's gray areas,
translation.zh: ‎确实有灰色地带

translation.en: this is just based on her… her opinion.
translation.zh: ‎这只是基于她的观点

translation.en: [Ashley] There's been so many cases,
translation.zh: ‎有太多案件

translation.en: so many families that have been affected and wrongly accused.
translation.zh:
‎太多家庭因为被错误指控
‎受到了影响

translation.en: How many times are you allowed to be wrong and destroy lives before they say,
translation.zh:
‎你能被允许错几次
‎毁掉多少人的人生 然后才能说

translation.en: "Okay, that's enough. It's time that we change some things"?
translation.zh:
‎“好了 够了吗？
‎我们需要做出一些改变了”

translation.en: What is it truly gonna take?
translation.zh: ‎到底需要付出什么代价？

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: ‎没关系

translation.en: Yeah, it's okay.
translation.zh: ‎对 没关系

translation.en: Courtroom H. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎H法庭室

translation.en: They stopped us from having our jury selection on Monday.
translation.zh: ‎他们阻止了我们周一进行陪审团选择

translation.en: It is now Tuesday,
translation.zh: ‎现在是周二

translation.en: and we have one more chance to go in front of the judge and, uh…
translation.zh:
‎我们还有一个机会
‎走到法官面前 然后…

translation.en: see if we could continue to have this trial,
translation.zh: ‎看我们能否继续审理这个案件

translation.en: starting tomorrow with the jury selection.
translation.zh: ‎明天开始陪审团选择

translation.en: If not, we'd probably have to live with this for another year.
translation.zh: ‎如果不行 我们可能还要再忍受一年

translation.en: We just gotta get off this ride. It's a horrible ride.
translation.zh:
‎我们真的需要给这件事画一个句号了
‎这段经历真的太恐怖了

translation.en: [Maya] Last night, I wrote a statement that I'd like to tell the court today,
translation.zh: ‎昨晚 我写了一个陈述 ‎我想今天在法庭上讲述

translation.en: and I'm hoping that they could finally hear me for once.
translation.zh:
‎我希望他们能
‎终于听进去一次我说的话

translation.en: I want them to know my mom was a good person.
translation.zh: ‎我想让他们知道 我妈妈是个好人

translation.en: I want them to know how strong she was and how determined she was.
translation.zh:
‎我想让他们知道 她有多坚强
‎决心有多大

translation.en: I think I'm mainly going there for her.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我去法庭上 主要是为了她

translation.en: [Jennifer] This trial means everything to them, because, without this, there's no closure.
translation.zh:
‎这个案件的审理对他们意味着一切
‎因为不进行审理 就没办法画上句号

translation.en: They need the world to hear their story.
translation.zh: ‎他们需要世界听到他们的故事

translation.en: It doesn't mean you fix it, but at least they can finally… move on.
translation.zh:
‎这不意味着能修正这件事
‎但至少这件事终于可以…翻页了

translation.en: [bailiff] All rise. This 12th Judicial Circuit Court in and for Sarasota County
translation.zh:
‎全体起立
‎萨拉索塔县第12司法巡回法院

translation.en: is now in session.
translation.zh: ‎现在开庭

translation.en: The Honorable Hunter Carroll presiding.
translation.zh: ‎尊敬的亨特·卡罗尔法官主持

translation.en: Please be seated, everyone.
translation.zh: ‎所有人请坐

translation.en: I moved 2,000 cases to make this trial happen,
translation.zh:
‎我把2000个案子放到一边
‎才让这次审理能够进行

translation.en: but we are now getting past the window of opportunity
translation.zh: ‎但我们现在错过了开始案件的

translation.en: to start the case.
translation.zh: ‎机会窗口

translation.en: That… That's just where I'm at.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我现在的感觉

translation.en: I understand that, Judge,
translation.zh: ‎我理解 法官

translation.en: but there's extenuating circumstances here,
translation.zh: ‎但也有情有可原的情况

translation.en: and I have the ability to cut the case down
translation.zh: ‎我有能力把案子精简到

translation.en: to the bare minimum to get the case done.
translation.zh: ‎最低限度 来让这个案子完结

translation.en: [Carroll] How do you get around the Second District Court of Appeal
translation.zh: ‎你怎么绕过第二区域上诉法院

translation.en: having stayed the trial?
translation.zh: ‎他们已经停止审理了？

translation.en: I mean, I… I can't say I can do jury selection but not the trial.
translation.zh:
‎我的意思是 我不能说
‎我可以选择陪审团 但不进行审理

translation.en: I don't see any limitation
translation.zh: ‎我认为法院在挑选

translation.en: in the Court's jurisdiction to pick a jury,
translation.zh: ‎陪审团的管辖权上 没有任何限制

translation.en: and I will do absolutely anything that's necessary
translation.zh: ‎我一定会做任何必要的事

translation.en: to get the case tried within the requisite period.
translation.zh: ‎在必要时间内让这个案子得到审理

translation.en: Mr. Altenbernd, any further response?
translation.zh: ‎阿尔滕伯德先生 还有什么回应吗？

translation.en: I just don't see how it's feasible.
translation.zh: ‎我只是不明白这怎么可行

translation.en: [Carroll] I… I'm at the point, folks,
translation.zh: ‎各位 现在

translation.en: that I feel like there's just too much uncertainty at this point,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得现在有太多不确定性了

translation.en: so at this point, I'm going to remove the case from the trial docket.
translation.zh:
‎所以现在我要把这个案子
‎从审判日程表上删除

translation.en: Uh, I will enter an order staying proceedings in the trial court,
translation.zh: ‎我将在初审法庭下令中止诉讼

translation.en: uh, until the earlier of May 4th, 2022,
translation.zh: ‎直到2022年5月4日

translation.en: or further order of the Court.
translation.zh: ‎或直到法院的进一步命令

translation.en: Is there anything else, uh, we need to discuss today?
translation.zh: ‎我们今天还有什么需要讨论的吗？

translation.en: Yes, Your Honor.
translation.zh: ‎是的 法官大人

translation.en: The Kowalskis are here, and they just wanted to speak to the court if that's all right.
translation.zh:
‎如果可以 这里的考尔斯基一家
‎他们想跟法院聊聊

translation.en: [Carroll] Well, it's a little unusual. Mr. Hunter, what's your thought?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 这有点不寻常
‎亨特先生 你怎么看？

translation.en: I don't know where this is going. I don't think it's a good idea.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道这会怎么样
‎我觉得这不是个好主意

translation.en: [Carroll] Um… I… I think it's probably best to just leave it at that.
translation.zh: ‎我想最好还是就此打住吧

translation.en: So… with that, we'll be in recess. I will get the orders out.
translation.zh:
‎到此为止 我们休息一下
‎我会发出命令

translation.en: [Gregory] Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎好 谢谢

translation.en: -[Carroll] Okay. Thank you all very much. -[Gregory] Your Honor.
translation.zh:
‎-好 非常感谢大家
‎-法官大人

translation.en: [bailiff] All rise. Court is in recess.
translation.zh: ‎全体起立 现在休庭

translation.en: I can't…
translation.zh: ‎我不能…

translation.en: [Jack] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Jack] Heartless bastards.
translation.zh: ‎一群冷血的混蛋

translation.en: They're just gonna continue to beat us up.
translation.zh: ‎他们只会继续不停打扮我们

translation.en: They don't give a shit.
translation.zh: ‎他们根本不在乎

translation.en: [Maya] Please stop talking. I don't wanna hear it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎可以别再说了吗？我不想再听了

translation.en: [Jack] Come here.
translation.zh: ‎过来

translation.en: [Kyle, crying] It's not fair, Dad. It's never gonna end. It's never gonna end!
translation.zh: ‎这不公平 爸爸 永远都不会结束

translation.en: It's never gonna end, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎永远不会结束的 爸爸

translation.en: Nothing works.
translation.zh: ‎什么都没用

translation.en: I pray every single night.
translation.zh: ‎我每晚都在祈祷

translation.en: Nothing. It doesn't help.
translation.zh: ‎什么都没有 根本没有用

translation.en: [Jack] The kids are totally crushed.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们完全崩溃了

translation.en: I'm crushed.
translation.zh: ‎我也崩溃了

translation.en: It wears you out.
translation.zh: ‎这会让你精疲力尽

translation.en: But if we give up and shut our mouths,
translation.zh: ‎但如果我们放弃 保持沉默

translation.en: it's gonna happen again.
translation.zh: ‎就会再次发生

translation.en: It's just a matter of time.
translation.zh: ‎只是时间问题

translation.en: [Chen] This doesn't just end with the Kowalskis, or just in Florida.
translation.zh:
‎这不止结束于考尔斯基一家
‎或者只发生在佛罗里达

translation.en: Families all across the country
translation.zh: ‎全国各地的家庭

translation.en: are coming forward with stories about being accused of child abuse.
translation.zh:
‎都在讲述出
‎自己被指控虐待儿童的故事

translation.en: Some families are stuck in the legal system for years,
translation.zh: ‎一些家庭被困在法律体系中数年

translation.en: battling these accusations.
translation.zh: ‎与这些指控作斗争

translation.en: Some parents are in prison to this day.
translation.zh: ‎有些家长至今仍在监狱

translation.en: The Kowalski family, they're standing up for these parents
translation.zh: ‎考尔斯基一家在代表这些家长发声

translation.en: and trying to bring awareness to this issue
translation.zh: ‎并试图让人们意识到

translation.en: that has been shrouded in so much shame and secrecy.
translation.zh: ‎这个问题一直笼罩在耻辱和秘密之中

translation.en: [director] Speeding.
translation.zh: ‎加速

translation.en: The windows, and everything's closed out here.
translation.zh: ‎窗户 所有东西都关着

translation.en: [Jack] We want Beata's voice to be heard.
translation.zh: ‎我们希望贝亚特的声音能被听到

translation.en: [director] We good on focus?
translation.zh: ‎我们聚焦好了吗？

translation.en: [Jack] We want Maya's voice to be heard.
translation.zh: ‎我们想让玛雅的声音能被听到

translation.en: [crew member] Yep. Great. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎对 很好 谢谢

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: ‎你还好吗？

translation.en: I want to speak.
translation.zh: ‎我想说话

translation.en: But I just… I can't without crying.
translation.zh: ‎但我就是… 我控制不住想哭

translation.en: [softly] I hate crying.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌哭

translation.en: [Beata, over recording] It's okay if you have to cry.
translation.zh: ‎你想哭也没关系

translation.en: It's… It's normal.
translation.zh: ‎这很正常

translation.en: You have to speak for yourself now because Mommy is not there.
translation.zh:
‎你现在必须为自己说话
‎因为妈妈不在那里

translation.en: Just close your eyes and pretend I'm there.
translation.zh: ‎闭上眼睛 假装我就在那里

translation.en: I know it's not the same, but just be strong.
translation.zh: ‎我知道这不一样 但你要坚强

translation.en: [young Maya] If you're watching this, Mommy, I want you to know that I love you.
translation.zh:
‎如果你在看这个 妈妈
‎我想让你知道我爱你

translation.en: Send you kisses.
translation.zh: ‎送给你亲吻

translation.en: You'll know it's from me.
translation.zh: ‎你会知道是我送的

translation.en: "Dear Mom."
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的妈妈”

translation.en: "Saying that life has felt fucked up since you left
translation.zh: ‎“说你离开后 我觉得生活一团糟

translation.en: is probably the biggest understatement I could make."
translation.zh:
‎可能是我能说出的
‎最轻描淡写的叙述了”

translation.en: "Dad, Kyle, and I have all had to adapt to your absence."
translation.zh:
‎“爸爸、凯尔和我
‎都要被迫适应你不在的日子”

translation.en: "Dad distracts himself
translation.zh: ‎“爸爸帮邻居刷油漆

translation.en: by helping the neighbors with painting projects."
translation.zh: ‎来分散自己的注意力”

translation.en: "Kyle does his best to escape by fishing for hours."
translation.zh:
‎“凯尔竭尽全力 通过数小时的垂钓
‎让自己脱离苦海”

translation.en: "When pouring all my energy into my schoolwork got to be too exhausting,
translation.zh:
‎“当我把所有的精力都投入到学业上
‎我觉得太累了

translation.en: I started to book every second of my free time with friends,
translation.zh:
‎我开始安排每一秒空闲时间
‎和朋友们在一起

translation.en: outside of the house and away from reminders."
translation.zh:
‎在房子外面
‎远离那些能让我想起来的东西”

translation.en: "But as soon as we step foot into our home,
translation.zh: ‎“但只要我们一踏进家门

translation.en: we are brought back to reality."
translation.zh: ‎我们就被带回了现实”

translation.en: "We miss you."
translation.zh: ‎“我们想你”

translation.en: "I miss you."
translation.zh: ‎“我想你”

translation.en: "For five years, we have been promised our trial."
translation.zh: ‎“五年来 我们一直被承诺将会审判”

translation.en: "Yet it seems that the closer we get to a set date,
translation.zh: ‎“然而 似乎我们离设定的日期越近

translation.en: the further it gets pushed."
translation.zh: ‎它就被推得越远”

translation.en: "Even though we are discouraged, we will not settle."
translation.zh:
‎“尽管我们感到气馁
‎但我们不会就此罢休”

translation.en: "We will fight for you,
translation.zh: ‎“我们会为你而战

translation.en: and we will fight for the thousands of other families
translation.zh: ‎我们将为成千上万个

translation.en: who find themselves in the same unfortunate circumstances."
translation.zh: ‎处于同样不幸情况的其他家庭而战

translation.en: "Our day will come. I love you."
translation.zh: ‎“我们的那一天会到来的 我爱你”

translation.en: [Beata, over recording] I love you too.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你

translation.en: I love you too.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你

translation.en: [Jack] We build a family with love.
translation.zh: ‎我们用爱建立一个家庭

translation.en: Honesty.
translation.zh: ‎用诚实

translation.en: Trust.
translation.zh: ‎信任

translation.en: We, as parents, try to do the best we can for our children.
translation.zh:
‎作为父母
‎我们会尽力为孩子做到最好

translation.en: You do everything for them.
translation.zh: ‎你会为他们不惜一切

translation.en: That's what Beata and I did.
translation.zh: ‎这正是贝亚特和我做的

translation.en: So our son Leo was born with a rare genetic disorder.
translation.zh:
‎所以你儿子里昂
‎有天生的罕见遗传障碍

translation.en: I noticed that something was wrong with his right leg.
translation.zh: ‎我注意到他的右腿有点问题

translation.en: She was crying and moving her arm in a weird way when we picked her up.
translation.zh:
‎她一直在哭 我们抱起她的时候
‎她用很奇怪的方式移动手臂

translation.en: DHS called and said, "You have to bring 'em in to our doctor."
translation.zh:
‎国土安全部打来电话说
‎“你必须把孩子带来给我们的医生”

translation.en: We went to the emergency room, and they did an X-ray on her.
translation.zh: ‎我们去了急诊室 医生给她拍了X光片

translation.en: The child-abuse pediatrician came in
translation.zh: ‎儿童虐待儿科医生来了

translation.en: and said there was no other explanation other than abusive head trauma.
translation.zh:
‎说除了虐待性的头部创伤之外
‎没有其他的解释了

translation.en: They never looked into his medical history.
translation.zh: ‎他们从来没有查看他的医疗历史记录

translation.en: Never did any type of due diligence to see what had been going on.
translation.zh:
‎从来没有尽责地查看
‎过去发生了什么

translation.en: And I said, "Can this be something else, such as a medical condition
translation.zh:
‎正如我所说 可能是其他的问题吗？
‎比如身体状况问题？

translation.en: because my son has never been hurt in any way?"
translation.zh: ‎因为我儿子从来没有受过任何伤

translation.en: And he said, "Yes, but since he's a baby and can't talk,
translation.zh:
‎他说“对 但因为他还是个宝宝
‎无法说话

translation.en: we're gonna go with abuse," and walked away.
translation.zh: ‎我们就认为是虐待” 然后就走了

translation.en: I thought I was doing the right thing by taking my child to the hospital,
translation.zh:
‎我以为把孩子带到医院
‎是在做正确的事

translation.en: and I honestly had no idea what the consequences could be.
translation.zh: ‎我当时真的不知道会有怎样的后果

translation.en: We went in there with two babies and left with none.
translation.zh:
‎我们带着两个宝宝去医院
‎离开的时候两个宝宝都不让我们带走

translation.en: I spent 15 years in prison.
translation.zh: ‎我在监狱服刑了15年

translation.en: My father, he was sentenced to prison,
translation.zh:
‎我在监狱服刑了15年 ‎我父亲被判入狱
‎他在监狱已经服刑了26年

translation.en: and he's been there for 26 years.
translation.zh:
‎我父亲被判入狱
‎他在监狱已经服刑了26年

translation.en: It's not "You're innocent until proven guilty."
translation.zh: ‎这不是“定罪之前始终无罪”

translation.en: It's "You're guilty until you prove your own innocence."
translation.zh: ‎是“你证明自己无罪之前始终有罪”

translation.en: I just cannot even believe that this is the actual system
translation.zh: ‎我都不敢相信这是现行的

translation.en: that is set in place to protect children.
translation.zh: ‎设置好用来保护儿童的体系

translation.en: We'd never thought this ever would have happened to us.
translation.zh: ‎我们从没想过身上会发生这样的事情

translation.en: But this can, in fact, happen to anyone at any time.
translation.zh:
‎但这种事情可以在任何时候
‎发生在任何人身上

translation.en: The trauma, like, it's… it's forever.
translation.zh: ‎这种伤痛是永远无法愈合的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对
